story:
March 10: LAST DAY UPDATE

With less than 24 hours left we're SO CLOSE to making our stretch goal of $2,500! To encourage your last-minute donations we're adding a special LAST DAY PERK! Anyone who donates between now and midnight tonight (when our campaign ends) will receive a personalized post card sent from World Cup, written by one of our players! Every penny gets us closer to Myrtle Beach, so don't hesitate to donate whatever you can. 
And thank you so much for all the support we've received so far! <3

Feb. 13th UPDATE: New Goals

We are so grateful for the overwhelming amount of support we've received so far. We never expected to make our goal in such a short amount of time (under 48 hours!) We've still got 25 days left in the campaign and a total cost of $15,000 to cover, so we've decided to raise the bar and see if we can achieve even bigger things. We're introducing two new stretch goals:

$2,500 - Hotel Accommodations

If we can reach $2,500 (and we're already halfway there) we can completely cover the cost of the hotel packages for our players ($110 per player).  If we reach this goal, our entire Quidditch team will post a video thanking you in song.

$4,500 - Hotel + On-site Transportation

Plane tickets are one thing, but we also have to cover transportation from the airport to the hotel, the hotel to the field, and back! This costs around $90 per player. If we reach this goal, everyone who donated will receive an additional perk of their choosing from the $25 mark and below! 

Please continue to share this and check out our Facebook page for daily player bios and fun previews of our perks like the video below! Love, McGill Quidditch.


Who We Are

The McGill Quidditch Team is the oldest Quidditch Team in Canada, created by Reid Robinson in 2008. Since then the Team has grown - in 2012 we added a second competitive team and this year launched an Intramural League to great success, attracting over 80 participants from the McGill Community. Currently ranked 15th in the world by the IQA, we tied for 3rd at the Canadian Cup in November and earned ourselves a spot at World Cup VII. 

Last year McGill Quidditch was unable to attend the World Cup in Florida due to conflicting exam schedules, although we qualified. We are determined not to miss out again. The money raised from this campaign will help lower our costs of $750 per player for air-travel, accommodation, and on-site transportation.  

Your contribution would help us to reduce what our players pay to $300 out-of-pocket, which is our ultimate fundraising goal. We are incredibly grateful for anything you can contribute since it gets us one step closer to competing on a world stage.

What We Need & What You Get

Our plane tickets are booked, hotel rooms reserved, and jerseys packed (well, not quite yet). But the expense to send 21 players from Canada to South Carolina is enormous, and we can't do it alone. 

Our total fundraising goal is $10,000, and we hope to raise $1200 of that through this Indiegogo campaign. To raise the rest we have planned raffles, parties, trivia nights, merchandise sales, and so much more.

In exchange for your donation we are offering some fantastic perks: 

  • Team photos
  • Original comics
  • Life advice
  • Handknit scarves & accessories 
  • T-shirts 
  • Hand-carved magic wands
  • AND MORE

The Impact

Hidden up here in the Great White North, Quidditch in Canada is reaching new levels of competitiveness. We are honoured to be travelling to World Cup with three exceptionally strong Canadian Quidditch teams, and we think this year could be Canada's best show yet. 

Last year, the World Cup missed out on McGill Quidditch. Help us show the rest of the Quidditch world what we can do!


Other Ways You Can Help

Check our facebook page for events and merchandise:

 https://www.facebook.com/McGillQuidditch

AND SHARE THIS PAGE WITH ALL YOUR FRIENDS

BROOMS UP!

story: For Haitian women, the chances of dying in childbirth are as high as 1 in 28.  Midwives for Haiti is a non-profit organization dedicated to teaching Haitian women the skills needed to be competent and safe birth attendants.  They also employ local midwives to work with the mobile clinics and at the hospital in order to provide prenatal and basic women's health care.  Each midwife is paid a salary of $3600/year.  Some of us make that in a month.  My goal is to raise enough funds to sponsor a midwife for a year.  I am starting low, but let's reach high and help MFH bring this simple care to the women of Hinche, Haiti.

story:
Los Angeles is known for it's healthy eateries and even healthier life style...

But every once in a while, indulging is a must, and that's where "Pamela's Kitchen Table" comes in!

Pamela's Famous Fried Green Tomatoes


Let's start by meeting Pamela:

  • Pamela was born in Atlanta, GA
  • She started cooking at the tender age of 8, and would cook whatever she could get her hands on.
  • She had an amazing group of Natural Born Cooks to model after... her Grandmother, Mom, and Aunts.
  • Down south, family is everything, so cooking is just another way time was spent, learning, laughing and loving.

Back home in Atlanta Georgia, Pamela's Grandmother, Mom, and Aunt, are cooking dinner together...

  • Pamela attended school in New Orleans, LA.
  • She studied the culture and cuisine, which increased her love of comfort food.

Pamela's Famous Seafood Gumbo

  • From New Orleans, Pamela moved on to New York City, where she was the General Manager of an NYC staple, Sarabeth's Restaurant. 
  • From there, she traveled on to Australia and cooked for a high profile family, while working in the Events Department of the Australia Zoo.
  • Given all her travels and experience , Pamela made time to study her craft, taking classes, working with chefs of all types, and really perfecting her preferred style of cuisine. Southern and Cajun!

Pamela's Kitchen Table, inspired my many child hood memories, is made up of 5 main ingredients .

  • Love
  • Authenticity
  • Fresh Homemade Spices 
  • Passed down Family Recipes
  • All the comforts of home, with a lot of southern hospitality

But how did she get to this point? Listen to Pamela, in her own words...


We've got a great plan, a solid foundation, the perfect space, and a menu that beats all others!

While Pamela has been able to accomplish a lot on her own, there is still much to be done. 

We want you to come home... and that's exactly what the inside of our space will reflect, once we've completed the transformation.

Here's what we need:

  • 2 additional commercial refrigerators
  • 1 additional commercial freezer
  • 1 additional stove and sink
  • A plumbing upgrade ( the space has not been used as a restaurant in quite some time, and needs reconfiguring in order to meet health inspection requirements)

The Impact of your Support makes all the Difference

If you watched the video above, then you know that Pamela has already established a successful business for herself, having started JustPLJ http://www.justplj.com/three years ago. The commitment and persistence it took to move from one house to 100 homes, is exactly the type of grit needed to open a successful restaurant in Los Angeles.

We are asking you to support a young entrepreneur, who has proven her capability, and has made the sacrifices needed to reach her goals, with out giving up.

We need 100 people to give $100 to accomplish our goal.

We realize that not everyone is able to give, but sharing Pamela's story, and helping us to get the word out, would be a tremendous gift.

If you are a lover of true Southern/Comfort Food, and are inspired by hard work and winning spirit, then we implore you to support this campaign. 

Thank You

"Good, Better, Best... never let it rest, until your Good is Better, and Your Better is Best"

story:
ABLE addresses the biggest challenges that keep you from exercising regularly. 

 

Motivation.  Access our move library anytime, anywhere from your desktop or mobile device at FitnessHardware.com.  Filter by skill level or muscle group focus.   

Time.  ABLE is simple and portable - with nothing to set up or adjust.  Perfect for workouts at home or taking on the go.  Even moderate ABLE workouts burn 200 - 300 calories in 20 minutes. 

Equipment.  No other piece of equipment offers this much functionality in such a small, simple and portable package.  ABLE's multi-directional movement takes body weight training to a whole new level. 

Watch This.  Our first factory samples just arrived!

 

    

Beginner?  Start with a huge number of modified strength, weight loss and balance moves from the knees.  Use our web app to review proper form and target specific muscles.

Advanced?  Try adding a weight vest for the strength and mass building moves you usually perform at the gym with free weights.

Somewhere in between?  ABLE is scalable for all fitness levels.  And, with hundreds of moves and move variations, you'll have no problem mixing up your routine to keep your muscles guessing.

Ready to start a program that will change your life? 

Here it is.   

ABLE is simple, portable, and offers unparalleled challenge and functionality.   Use them on almost any smooth surface - perfect on home carpeting and gym floors of all kinds.  ABLE offers hundreds of moves and move variations, whether you are a Yogi, looking for a weight loss program, or an athlete looking to build strength and mass.    

With ABLE - the gym is optional!

We're coming off of the success of a previous crowdsource campaign and looking to pre-sell more ABLE units and develop more videos for our workout move library.  With the hardware design complete, part of our goal will fund several new, challenging (and free access) workout videos we plan to launch when our ABLE hardware lands in customers hands.
 

 

Body weight training, high intensity interval training, cross fit and workouts that challenge balance with instability are the leading trends in fitness and sports training today.  Traditional pushup platforms just don't cut it any more.  ABLE blows up the pushup platform concept into an incredible total-body solution.


We've designed a slick workout move library at FitnessHardware.com.  Filter moves by skill level or by muscle group focus to put together workouts and review proper form.  *Full follow-along workouts are coming soon! 
 

 

 
 

 

Our production molds are complete, our production samples are approved, and our first order will be stateside and ready to ship to customers in late December!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Want a little more fitness motivation?  Check out our first ABLE commercial! 

 

At this point, I expect your biggest question is.... Blue, or Red?

story:
I can get myself to swim squad during my lunch break to swim lap after lap.....

I can get myself up at 4:00am to ride hills for 3 hours before work.....

I can put myself to bed early on Friday nights so I wake fresh to run 20kms on Saturdays.....

What I can't do is fund myself to compete at the ITU World Triathlon Championships in London.......I need your Help!

I have been training and trialling for the past year to be the best I can possibly be in my chosen sport of triathlon.  The hard work has paid off and I have been selected to represent Australia in my category at Worlds in London in September 2013; however I need your help to get me there.  It is a self funded team and with uniforms, race fees and flights it is financially out of my reach, any support you can contribute no matter how big or small will help get me to the start line and ultimately to my goal!

My pledge to you.....

Your support to me is much more than financial and so I pledge to you:-

  • to swim every lap with the aim of perfecting my stroke & reducing my times;
  • to ride every hill to build my strength & increase my speed;
  • to run every kilometre focusing on my pace & overcoming my mental struggles;
  • to train & then train some more with every spare moment I have; and finally
  • to race at my very best & make you all proud!

I can get myself up at 4:00am to ride hills for 3 hours before work.....
I can put myself to bed early on Friday nights so I wake fresh to run 20kms on Saturdays.....

story:
Hi!  I'm Colleen Schneider, a professional MMA fighter and Catch Wrestler, and my teammate is an All-American wrestler at Simon Frasier University.  Together we went to Colorado Springs to compete against the best the US has to offer at the Grappling World Team Trials and both came away victorious in our weight divisions! 

Our next step is to head to Hungary to represent the US at the World Grappling Championships on October 24th!  We've got the training and crushing of opponents down, our biggest challenge now is that the trip is self-funded.  So we're reaching out to our friends, family, lovers of wrestling, and supporters of strong, awesome women, to help us.

The Impact

My teammate is a driven collegiate wrestler and All-American at one of the best women's wrestling programs in North America.  I am an accomplished MMA fighter and grappler, having fought for Strikeforce and UFC's "The Ultimate Fighter."  We will take our unique backgrounds and experience, under the tutelage of Josh Barnett, Erik Paulson, and Erik Arevalo, to take on all challengers and represent Catch Wrestling at the very top levels of competition. 

Your donation, big or small, will help us to reach our dreams: to bring back gold medals for the USA!

Funding will go to the following:

  • Flights to and from Budapest for both competitors
  • Room and board for our time at the competition, set up through the competition organizing committee
  • Fees for FILA licenses

IF we don't reach our full funding goal, we will take whatever contributions we've received and self-fund the remaining amount.   Whatever happens, we are both committed to going to Worlds and representing our country to the very best of our ability.  

Shirts!

Help us our and look super awesome in the process! Newaza Apparel and Defila designed an awesome graphic that we have printed up on white men's tee shirts and heather grey women's tank tops for you.  You can order by contributing to the fundraiser on this page, $25 per shirt or tank, plus $5 for shipping on the order as a whole.  Leave a note with what style, size and address, or email me that info at schneider.cm@gmail.com. 

All proceeds from shirt sales go towards the fundraiser. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word about our campaign! Email, social media and word of mouth are all great ways to help let others know.
story_txt:
Hi!  I'm Colleen Schneider, a professional MMA fighter and Catch Wrestler, and my teammate is an All-American wrestler at Simon Frasier University.  Together we went to Colorado Springs to compete against the best the US has to offer at the Grappling World Team Trials and both came away victorious in our weight divisions!  
Our next step is to head to Hungary to represent the US at the World Grappling Championships on October 24th!  We've got the training and crushing of opponents down, our biggest challenge now is that the trip is self-funded.  So we're reaching out to our friends, family, lovers of wrestling, and supporters of strong, awesome women, to help us.

The ImpactMy teammate is a driven collegiate wrestler and All-American at 
one of the best women's wrestling programs in North America.  I am an 
accomplished MMA fighter and grappler, having fought for Strikeforce and
 UFC's "The Ultimate Fighter."  We will take our unique 
backgrounds and experience, under the tutelage of Josh Barnett, Erik 
Paulson, and Erik Arevalo, to take on all challengers and represent Catch Wrestling at the very top 
levels of competition.  Your donation, big or small, will help us to reach our dreams: to bring back gold medals for the USA!

Funding will go to the following: 
Flights to and from Budapest for both competitors
 Room and board for our time at the competition, set up through the competition organizing committee
Fees for FILA licenses


IF we don't reach our full funding goal, we will take whatever contributions we've received and self-fund the remaining amount.   Whatever happens, we are both committed to going to Worlds and representing our country to the very best of our ability.  

Shirts!
Help us our and look super awesome in the process! Newaza Apparel and Defila designed an awesome graphic that we have printed up on white men's tee shirts and heather grey women's tank tops for you.  You can order by contributing to the fundraiser on this page, $25 per shirt or tank, plus $5 for shipping on the order as a whole.  Leave a note with what style, size and address, or email me that info at schneider.cm@gmail.com.  
All proceeds from shirt sales go towards the fundraiser.  

Other Ways You Can Help


Spread the word about our campaign! Email, social media and word of mouth are all great ways to help let others know.

story:
This is a FunnyJunk community campaign aimed at collecting money for a total stranger who suffers from terminal lung cancer.

Where do I begin.

For me this story starts in January 2015.

I'm devastated to learn that my younger brother Rune has died after what should have been a routine hip procedure.

My life get's thrown out of wack and I don't know what to do with myself.

One thing helps me get my mind on other things tho.

FunnyJunk.

A community of weirdos and eccentric people entertaining each other with funny videos, pictures and comic strips.

Here on this site I find myself again and I get back on my feet in the real world.

So suffice to say that I owe this community a debt of gratitude.

It's now 9 months later and I regularly visit FunnyJunk.

But today it did not bring a smile to my face to visit the community.

Another user had made a somewhat resigned post that said he just had been diagnosed with terminal cancer and had 3 months left to live.

3 months!

And he is 20 years old.

He has no insurance so whatever chances he might have had however slim they might be are non existent.

This made me angry.

I'm not gonna let a fellow FJ'er die without a fight.

I'm well aware that the chances are slim to non but I will be damned if I do not try to help.

So this is a call for help.

Donate whatever you see appropriate. Or just visit this post and say hi.

http://funnyjunk.com/Bad+fuckin+news/funny-pictures/5693210/

Show that you care.

Show your support.

Show that he has something to live for.

If not to try and cure him.

Then at least go give him the means the go out with a blast.

What We Need & What You Get

The 15000$ is just to get this poor guy started with what he needs in terms of medical care.

I have no clue what the final medical bill would be but it most certainly will be more than 15000$

But with this money one of two things will be done. Either he starts the treatment or he spends it on himself for the last 3 months of his life. This must be his choice.

It is worth mentioning that the success of a treatment this far in will be vary low.

You will get that funny feeling you get when you help a total stranger.

Risks

There is a chance however unlikely that this guy is lying.

If so the money will be donated to charity. Most likely some form of cancer charity.

Not a single penny will go to me or anyone else other than the guy in question.

When I say the guy it is because I haven't been able to get his actual name.

He personally refuses help and if he in the end do not want to receive it, we will donate the money in his name.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help

Spread the word and come visit this post.

http://funnyjunk.com/Bad+fuckin+news/funny-pictures/5693210/

Say Hi :D we wont bite.

story:
Help me help others, by funding my yoga teacher training at Sterling Hot Yoga Works!

I've been given the opportunity to take my career as a wellness professional to another level, by learning how to share the art of yoga with others. The journey of practicing yoga has changed my life so much for the better, which is why I am thrilled to be invited to a special teacher training workshop run by Sterling Hot Yoga Works.

My passion for yoga grows daily, and serves as a natural complement to my existing work as a massage therapist and personal trainer. I'm so happy to have the opportunity to share that joy and healing with others -- but I need your help to make it happen!


About Me:Yoga played an integral role in my ability to overcome substance dependency. Yoga is my therapy. The Bikram (hot Hatha yoga) practice doesn't just keep me in shape; it also helps keep me balanced and sane. I have a mood disorder that I tried self-medicate with marijuana but only ended up abusing said "medicine." I was diagnosed ADHD and Bipolar but I never stuck to the various medications thrown at me over the years because the side effects seemed worse than my behavioral issues. Yoga, meditation, and regular therapy have transformed my life. My daily meditation, especially in the hot room, is what I use these days to keep myself well, happy, and productive!

I am a professional massage therapist, and have a true passion for it.  Yoga is such a perfect complement to my career. I have a great working knowledge of anatomy and physiology. I practice the yoga that I'll be training to teach regularly (5-7 days a week). I have also worked as  personal trainer in the recent past.

story:
So what's the story?

Water polo at Centennial High School is a Cinderella story. But, it's the part of the story BEFORE the ball.

Washing cars, twirling signs for discount furniture, serving burgers, selling rootbeer, diving for cans- they've done it all.

Problem is, it costs $9000 to fund the season. They made one cut off by raising $5k before September 1. Now, they need to raise another $4k by October 1. Or they turn into pumpkins.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

What we need, to put it bluntly, is cash. What you get is a warm feeling when you come to our games. You'll know that you've kept a great group of kids in the water and off the couch hooked up to Xbox.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, please like us on Facebook and put our link on your wall. If we get 200 people to contribute $20, we're done.

story:
Product:

SPORT RAZOR is a compact do-it-yourself body razor. It's small enough to fit in your toiletry bag for travel yet long enough to reach anywhere on your body.

 

SPORT RAZOR is great for athletes such as:

  • Body Builders

  • Wrestlers

  • Swimmers

  • Cyclists

SPORT RAZOR is also great for anyone with limited mobility due to:

  • Pregnancy

  • Injury

  • Surgery

  • Age

  • Size


Only 8 3/4 inches in length when folded

16 inch reach when in open position

Everybody knows somebody that could benefit from the SPORT RAZOR.

 

ABOUT US:

Hello, my name is M Todd Gilbert and I created the SPORT RAZOR.

Girls talk about how hairy backs are so gross and they would never date a guy with a hairy back. Unfortunately as I became older, I started to get some hair on my back. Although there wasn't much hair on my back, I was very selfconscious about it. I couldn't find anything on the market I could use to shave my back. So after much thought I came up with the idea of the SPORT RAZOR. I had the basic design right away but through some trial and error there were changes made until we reached the final product.

The more I thought about it and talked to other people I realized there is a  wider application including people having limited mobility.

Since I have used all my own money to finanace this project, I could have never got this idea off the ground had it not been for my project management experience in the area of manufacturing and finance. This has been my dream. I have taken my dream as far as I can go but with your help, I can make my dream become a reality of having a Direct Response Television (DRTV) ad!

A DRTV ad is short infomercial ad you frequently see on TV. Some examples would be Oxi Clean, Chia Pet, etc.

The best way to reach the market for this product is through DRTV.

 

TESTIMONIALS:

“YAY!!!!! Finally, a razor I can use and LOVE. The 'Sportrazor' is fabulous! I had a hip replacement and have trouble bending to shave my legs.
NOT ANYMORE! The Sportrazor's length is Perfect! THANK YOU!!!!!!!!”

“LOVE the Pink Razor!!!!!! :)”

Susan N.
Coral Springs, FL

“I use this razor all the time. It is great and the vendor is great to deal with. I'm actually planning on buying another one as I don't want to not have one if I happen to lose the first one.”

”It is very easy to use and I have not cut myself as I have on other razors.....not that you couldn't but it's not as risky.”

”I would really recommend you purchase one if you are considering buying one.”

Frank
Sacramento, CA

"I've been using the Sport Razor for the last couple of weeks and just love it. It has a nice long sturdy handle which makes it easy to shave my legs in the shower and the razor head pivots smoothly. The handle folds in half which allows it to store neatly in my overnight bag. My husband even tried it on his back and it worked great, very easy for his to use.
Thanks Sport Razor!! "

Stormy H.
Sacramento, CA

 

PERKS:

You receive the following for your contribution level:

$1

  • Personal thank you email

 

$20

  • 1 SPORT RAZOR ($29.95 value)
  • 1 pack of 4 triple blade replacement cartridges ($9.95 value)

TOTAL RETAIL VALUE OF PRODUCTS $39.90

  • 2 SPORT RAZORs ($59.90 value)
  • 2 packs of 4 triple blade replacement cartridges ($19.90 value)

  • 3 SPORT RAZORs ($89.85 value)
  • 3 packs of 4 triple blade replacement cartridges ($29.85 value)

TOTAL RETAIL VALUE OF PRODUCTS $129.70

  • 7 packs of 4 triple blade replacement cartridges ($69.65 value)

TOTAL RETAIL VALUE OF PRODUCTS $279.30

  • 15 packs of 4 triple blade replacement cartridges ($149.25 value)
  • 1 official SPORT RAZOR t-shirt ($15 value)

TOTAL RETAIL VALUE OF PRODUCTS $613.50

  • 35 packs of 4 triple blade replacement cartridges ($348.25 value)
  • 2 official SPORT RAZOR t-shirts ($30 value)

TOTAL RETAIL VALUE OF PRODUCTS $1426.50

  • 96 packs of 4 triple blade replacement cartridges ($955.20 value)
  • 4 official SPORT RAZOR t-shirts ($60 value)
  • List you as a retailer on our website (priceless)

TOTAL RETAIL VALUE OF PRODUCTS $3890.40

 

$2500

  • 2 cases (192) SPORT RAZORs ($5750.40 value)
  • 192 packs of 4 triple blade replacement cartridges ($1910.40 value)
  • 4 official SPORT RAZOR t-shirts ($60 value)
  • List you as a retailer on our website (priceless)

TOTAL RETAIL VALUE OF PRODUCTS $7720.80

 

$5750

  • 5 cases (480) SPORT RAZORs ($14,376.00 value)
  • 480 packs of 4 triple blade replacement cartridges ($4776.00 value)
  • 4 official SPORT RAZOR t-shirts ($60 value)
  • List you as a retailer on our website (priceless)

TOTAL RETAIL VALUE OF PRODUCTS $19,212.00

 

$10,500

  • 10 cases (960) SPORT RAZORs ($28,752.00 value)
  • 960 packs of 4 triple blade replacement cartridges ($9552.00 value)
  • 4 official SPORT RAZOR t-shirts ($60 value)
  • List you as a distributor on our website (priceless)

TOTAL RETAIL VALUE OF PRODUCTS $38,364.00

 

 

WHERE YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS GO:

Your help getting the word out about SPORT RAZOR and your contributions will take this great product to the next level.

All the funding raised along with my money saved will go towards the DRTV ad. I'm looking to raise $50,000+. If I don't reach my goal, I will continue saving money earned from my regular job until I can afford to fund the DRTV ad.

 

ANYONE CAN HELP!

Even if you can't financially contribute, you can still be a huge help by spreading the word about SPORT RAZOR. You can use the Indiegogo share tools and we are also on Facebook. Please like or add us and ask your friends to as well. With your help, together we can make my dream become a reality.

 

Thank you for your time and support!

story:
Dear Friends,

Catalyst Productions is a Charlottesville, Virginia-based non-profit organization committed to social responsibility.  We ask your help in responding to the recent water crisis in West Virginia, a dire situation worsening by the minute and receiving no appropriate attention, no needed investment.  Over 300,000 residents have no access to safe tap water.  No bathing.  Nothing to drink. 

On January 9th a coal-cleaning chemical was spilled into the Elk River, one of West Virginia’s most vital water sources.  The infrastructure devastation is massive.  There is no funding plan for relief.  The offending company has filed for bankruptcy and has abandoned residents.  Day-to-day conditions are heartbreaking. 

Catalyst Productions is answering the call to respond through Operation FreeFlow.  On January 25th Catalyst partnered with Sanger Carpentry, Appalachian Voices, and other corporate sponsors to host a benefit concert at the Jefferson Theater in downtown Charlottesville.  This crucial first event provided an opportunity to raise awareness about folks enduring with no real help in sight, to channel resources for immediate bottled water relief, and to begin the work of establishing an endowment for comprehensive infrastructure restoration in West Virginia.  We have already trucked 44 tons of water to the victims of the water crisis, barely a drop in the tank.  This work is just the beginning.

  Our next step is an indoor Local Wine, Craft Beer, Visual Art and Music Festival at downtown Charlottesville’s historic Paramount Theater on Sunday, March 23rd—the next of several future benefit events to support Catalyst’s continued investment in addressing the problem in West Virginia.

Catalyst asks for your support through donations to help us achieve our goal of extending Operation FreeFlow’s impact as far and wide as possible.  Our target amount is $25,000.  We hope to raise much more than that.  Contributions from private donors will not only yield necessary funding for our operating budget for the March 23rd event at the Paramount, but also provide financial resources crucial to our aspirations of  mounting additional escalating benefit concerts this spring and summer, additional bottled water relief, and the inital consultations on a meaningul infrastructure solution.

  The clock is ticking.  Recent reports on the ground in West Virginia paint a gruesome picture.  The time to move is now.  If you are ready to join this important cause, please donate today.

  Thank you for your consideration.  Join us.  Let’s fix this problem.  People are suffering.  They need us.  Let’s let them hear from the good people of Charlottesville, the Commonwealth, and beyond.

Sincerely,

Ian Babcock

Executive Director: Catalyst Productions & Gallery

Media Coverage:

http://www.c-ville.com/local-nonprofit-teams-with-volunteers-to-bring-aid-to-west-virginia/#.UthNUq-A1xR

http://www.nbc29.com/story/24464867/cville-nonprofit-heads-relief-effort-after-wva-water-contamination

http://wina.com/podcasts/morning-news-weekends-ian-babcock/

http://www.nbc29.com/story/24549295/concert-raises-money-for-west-virginians-without-water

spilled into the Elk River, one of West Virginia’s most vital water sources.  The infrastructure devastation is
massive.  There is no funding plan for
relief.  The offending company has filed
for bankruptcy and has abandoned residents. 
Day-to-day conditions are heartbreaking. 

Catalyst Productions is answering the call to respond through
Operation
FreeFlow.  On January 25th Catalyst
partnered with Sanger Carpentry, Appalachian Voices, and other corporate
sponsors to host a benefit concert at the Jefferson Theater in downtown
Charlottesville.  This crucial first
event provided an opportunity to raise awareness about folks enduring with no
real help in sight, to channel resources for immediate bottled water relief,
and to begin the work of establishing an endowment for comprehensive
infrastructure restoration in West Virginia.  We have already trucked 44 tons of water to
the victims of the water crisis, barely a drop in the tank.  This work is just the beginning.
  Our next step is an indoor Local
Wine, Craft Beer, Visual Art and Music Festival at downtown Charlottesville’s
historic Paramount Theater on Sunday, March 23rd—the next of several
future benefit events to support Catalyst’s continued investment in addressing
the problem in West Virginia.Catalyst
asks for your support through donations to help us achieve our goal of
extending Operation FreeFlow’s impact as far and wide as possible.  Our target amount is $25,000.  We hope to raise much more than that.  Contributions from private donors will not
only yield necessary funding for our operating budget for the March 23rd
event at the Paramount, but also provide financial resources crucial to our aspirations
of  mounting additional escalating benefit
concerts this spring and summer, additional bottled water relief, and the inital consultations on a meaningul infrastructure solution.
  The clock is ticking.  Recent reports on the ground in West Virginia
paint a gruesome picture.  The time to
move is now.  If you are ready to join
this important cause, please donate today.
  Thank you for your
consideration.  Join us.  Let’s fix this problem.  People are suffering.  They need us. 
Let’s let them hear from the good people of Charlottesville, the Commonwealth,
and beyond.
Sincerely,
Ian Babcock

Executive Director: Catalyst Productions &
Gallery
Media Coverage:http://www.c-ville.com/local-nonprofit-teams-with-volunteers-to-bring-aid-to-west-virginia/#.UthNUq-A1xRhttp://www.nbc29.com/story/24464867/cville-nonprofit-heads-relief-effort-after-wva-water-contaminationhttp://wina.com/podcasts/morning-news-weekends-ian-babcock/http://www.nbc29.com/story/24549295/concert-raises-money-for-west-virginians-without-water

story:
18 people die everyday waiting for transplant

1 organ donor can save the lives of 8 people

still need more convincing?

http://www.mayoclinic.org/healthy-living/consum...

APRIL - National Organ Donation Month

Life changed immenensly on December 29, 2013 and each day I find something else that I miss about him. However, each day I still struggle to find words to express my gratidute to his donor. We gained more time; more laughs and more of that immense love that anyone in his presence could feel. I may never find the words but if we learned anything from his legacy, actions speak louder. 

Organ Donation

Join this movement to make a difference. If we all sign up, we can save each other.

  • Currently over 120,000 people in need of organ transplant right now.
  • Every 10 minutes a name is added to the list, yet in 2012 only 28,052 transplants were performed.
  • Everyday 18 people die due to lack of available organs.
  • All our fundraising will go to Donate Life, a non-profit with a mission to increase awareness of organ donation and a vision that it is a human responsibility. 

LIVE IT. GIVE IT. LIFE. 

What We Need & What You Get

Show us that you have registered as a donor, with the DMV, the New England Organ Bank - preferably both and at the end of the month your name will be entered to win:

  • A gift card from Meadowbrook in Gilford NH
  • A gift card from Buffalo Wild Wings

REGISTER HERE:     http://donatelife.net/register-now/

Keep Coming Back….

There will be so much more posted here through out the month….

  • Please look for more information, events and links through this month.
  • Check out this video:     https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=awnaha6cFMo



Other Ways You Can Help

Please help spread the word:

  • The money helps Donate Life raise awareness, however we need organ donors on that list, please forward this link, post it to your social media account, encourage people to sign up and talk to your loved ones about your wishes.
  • 90% of Americans support donations yet only 30% know the steps to register to become a donor….. show them how, help the 120,000 in need of transplant today.

And shake the hand that shook the hand of Abraham ;)

story:
Introduction to uCANcer

uCANcer is born with this objective: to give an adequate support structure to patients that have cancer, through the mapping and evaluation of medical facilities worldwide. The name uCANcer joins the word “cancer” with the words “you can”, encouraging the patients to believe that they can beat cancer. 
The idea of the project came in response to the “mHealth – Enhancing Cancer Support Care” contest, sponsored by the Helsinn Group in collaboration with SDA Bocconi University. 
The project consists of realizing a web platform and a mobile application, with the objective of giving patients access to tools with which they can find the most suited facilities to their care needs. 

The system for the evaluation of medical facilities adopted by uCANcer is based on the construction of an innovative cross evaluation model, which we have decided to call HCE (Healthcare Cross Evaluation). 

The healthcare indicators which are taken into account offer an objective evaluation of the experience that medical facilities have in the treatment of specific types of cancer. The healthcare indicators include data such as number of admissions, number of treatments and an index on the scale of the complexity of the cases treated. 
On the other hand, the patient evaluation is based on non-medical data, such as accessibility to the facility, waiting times, and friendliness and general courtesy of the personnel. This data is compiled by a customer satisfaction questionnaire studied by uCANcer. 
The result of this research will guide the patient to a list of facilities – patients will then have 3 key figures at their disposal: the cross evaluation HCE, the evaluation of healthcare indexes for cancer, and finally the evaluation of individual patients.
The primary objective of uCANcer is therefore to help patients acquire the knowledge that they can beat cancer, choosing the right medical facilities which best suit the needs of every individual. This is why we need your support, too. 


uCANcer Features 

1 – Development of a web platform and a mobile application (smartphones and tablets); 
2 – The system for the evaluation of medical facilities based on the construction of an innovative cross evaluation model – healthcare indicators (derived from Hospitals, National Health Institute and Board of Health data) and non-health indicators (derived from the evaluation of invidual patients, compiled through a customer satisfaction questionnaire); 
3 –Use of complex health indicators, both quantitative and qualitative, aimed to offer an objective evaluation of the experience that medical facilities have in the treatment of specific types of cancer. 
4 - Use of a customer satisfaction questionnaire studied by uCANcer.

Our Goals 

As stated before, our main goal is to give an adequate support structure to patients that have cancer, through the mapping and evaluation of medical facilities worldwide. 
Regarding the implementation of uCANcer, our goal is to launch the web platform and mobile application in early 2015. The application will be available in Italian and English, for Apple, Android and Windows systems. 
Another future goal is to apply the uCANcer research and evaluation model (HCE) to neurology and cardiology, expanding the number of diseases treated by the applications managed from the startup company Innovation for Healthcare.


How We Will Use Your Contributions

We ask for your support in order to develop and launch uCANcer web platform and mobile application, complementing the initial investment made by the company Innovation for Healthcare. 65% of funds will be used for programming costs; 15% for communication and graphics; 10% for marketing and advertising; the last 10% as cover of administrative costs.



How will uCANcer work



Innovation for Healthcare

Innovation for Healthcare is a start-up company founded by healthcare professionals, with the objective of realizing and managing innovative products, services and applications in the healthcare sector. uCANcer is a non-profit project created and managed by Innovation for Healthcare, and it represents one of the e-health projects under development. The team consists of healthcare professionals, specialized in healthcare management, with expertise ranging from business planning to marketing, from hospital consulting to computer programming. The passion for health and technology, the need to give concrete support to patients, the growing e-health trend and the willing to innovate and change healthcare, led the team to undertake this project.

story:
Questo progetto di acquaticità si rivolge a tutti i bambini affetti da Atrofia Muscolo Spinale SMA. L’obbiettivo è supportare economicamente le famiglie attraverso la presa in carico di tutte quelle spese che saranno necessarie affinché questi bambini possano entrare in acqua e sentirsi più liberi di muoversi.

Ricky il nostro eroe ne è l’esempio, vieni a vedere la sua pagina su facebook www.facebook.com/rickyilnostroeroe

Posso vedere un video?

Si, basterà cliccare su questo link http://youtu.be/CyIOhsuIdW8

A cosa serviranno i fondi raccolti?

Saranno utilizzati per supportare le famiglie e per coprire tutti i costi del progetto

Come posso essere informato?

Andando sul sito www.iswimsma.com, scrivendo una mail a info@iswimsma.com oppure sulla nostra pagina facebook I SWIM SMA

Chi c’è dietro questo progetto?

È un progetto dell’Associazione SMAile ONLUS

Se hai altre domande contattaci pure a info@smaile.org

story:
We are so happy to be able to offer you our new creation;

This sandal is the result of close teamwork between Lina Rodriguez Conde, specialist in Zonal Reflexology, and Astrid Weissenborn-Garcia, artist and sculptor.

We came together in order to create a sandal which would stimulate the areas on the soles of the feet where you find the reflex projections of our main energy centers, our internal organs and tissues.

All you have to do to benefit from this stimulation is walk around while wearing Yol Sandals.

‘YOL’ in the Turkish language means ‘way/path’. And walking with Yol Sandals is precisely the ‘way’ to reap the benefits of the gentle stimulation on the soles of your feet from the carefully designed, raised texture of the sandals.

(See:  What is Zonal Reflexology?)

Here are some of the questions you might have:


Yes.

Simply wearing Yol Sandals will improve our levels of energy and general well- being without having to follow any specific therapy. Clearly, Yol Sandals can never replace the hands of an expert therapist, yet the gentle stimulation generated by the precise, irregular surface of the sandals can help maintain the positive effects of therapy during and after treatment as well as have a harmonizing effect in general, freeing us from many aches and pains.


We all know that Nature and life itself follow a rhythm. We recommend using Yol Sandals regularly. This way, our internal rhythms of self regulation are strengthened.  Get used to Yol Sandals gradually, beginning with 10 minutes the first few days and increasing their use little by little, making sure you feel comfortable. Keep in mind that wearing Yol Sandals as we move about will help us start the day with positive energy as well as finish the day feeling more relaxed, promoting a deeper and more reparative night’s sleep.

No.                                                                                                                              

For those of us who have no time to spare, this is especially good news.  Start your day with Yol Sandals: when you come out of the shower, as you do things around the house, when you go to the pool or the beach, enjoy the garden or take your dog for a walk, etc. …. whenever it is convenient and comfortable.


Either way is fine! Yol Sandals are for all 365 days of the year!

You can wear them with or without socks! If your feet are cold, do whatever will keep you comfortable.  Depending on your reflex sensitivity, you will be able to notice the stimulation from the irregular surface of Yol Sandals even through your socks.


Simply brushing the sandals with a dry brush is usually enough.  If necessary, you can also use soap and water. Afterwards, place the sandals upside-down to dry completely with the straps open. 

Zonal Reflexology is a technique from traditional Chinese medicine.  It is based upon the discovery that all parts of our body are reflected in form and texture in the periphery of our body, and that when we act upon these projections using the criteria of energymedicine, we can bring about deep healing.

The following books (in Spanish) by Lina Rodriguez Conde are excellent sources of further information:

" El lenguaje oculto de los pies " ( Editorial Sumatra) 

and 

"Donde el mar se refleja", teoría y práctica de la Reflexología  Zonal ( ISER).

With your help, the following firms in Levante (eastern coastal area of Spain) will collaborate:

Moldes Unico: The aluminum molds

Analco: Preparation of the rubber inner and outer soles

Flecintex: Soft and durable straps

Britigraf:   Plastic buckles and cloth tags

Troppa:  Assembly of the entire sandal

TexAguila: Cotton bags, 100% unbleached cotton.

Molero, Patentes & Marcas S.L.( Madrid): Registration and patents 

 …As you can see, we offer you a product 100% made in Spain!

In order to deal with the expenses involved in the preparation of Yol Sandals, we ask for your vote of confidence in the form of an advance purchase of a pair of Yol Sandals. You can find the launch prices for the different packages on the right or below.

VERY INTERESTING OFFERS FOR THE FIRST TO INVEST!!


At the end of our launch campaign, (May 25) you will receive an e-mail asking you to confirm your postal address and your e-mail address as well as the shoe size(s) ordered.

 Yol Sandals will be burgundy-colored and available in the following unisex sizes:



We will then need until the end of July to produce the sandal and will let you know by e-mail when your order is ready.  

 You can be sure we will do our utmost to get your Yol Sandals to you as quickly as possible!

Where can we buy Yol Sandals once the launch campaign is over?

Sales will be online and at the Yol Sandals warehouse in Hoyo de Manzanares, Madrid, Spain.   Astrid Weissenborn will handle the commercial aspects. We also plan to have Yol Sandals represented in trade fairs related to health and/or alternative therapies.  The details of upcoming fairs will be regularly updated on our website:

www.yol-sandals.com

We look forward to receiving your comments, suggestions and photos of you wearing your Yol Sandals!

We are counting on you!

Whatever your support: purchasing our sandals, sharing our on-line campaign, telling your friends about Yol Sandals and just for being interested:

                                        THANK YOU VERY MUCH!!!

story:
Hi. I am Jake and I am 8 years old. Today, I just won my local MLB Pitch Hit Run competition in Cole Harbour, Nova Scotia. I qualified to compete in the sectionals competition but it is in another province - Ontario, Canada and it is next week so there is not much time to raise money to go. The event is put on through the MLB (http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/kids/mlb_pitch_hit_run.jsp) and the winner of the competition on June 14th in Mississauga, Ontario gets to compete on the field of a Toronto Blue Jays Baseball Game. The winner of that competition gets to compete at the 2015 MLB All-Star game!!!!!

I am trying to raise $2000 CAD in 5 days to be able to buy plane tickets for my parents and I to go to Mississauga. I can stay with family so the funds will be used to get us there. My goal is to have at least 2000 people support me with $1 each.

I worked hard to win my local competition and really want the chance to compete in Sectionals to get to the Rogers Centre with the Blue Jays.

Thank you! ps if you helped your awesome (= (= (=!

story:
Thousands have experienced          My Therapy Buddy's LOVE.




      Now is your turn to make                someone special smile. 

          TO ORDER: select your PERK to your right and save 20%   

         (By paying no tax or shipping when ordering on Indiegogo)


My Therapy Buddy (MTB) was designed as a drug free method for achieving behavioral modification or stress relief and has been used by thousands of people worldwide since 2002.   MTB is a transitional object, and has been recommended by psychologists and other licensed mental health professionals for over fourteen years.

My Therapy Buddy ultimately serves as a therapeutic intervention, used as an accessible, soothing and comforting “person replacement” for those who might need additional support in times of psychological or physical pain and suffering.  MTB can help any individual that has difficulty coping with stress-related, emotional or physical problems.  Buddy is also a great companion for anyone, and people love to hear MTB say  ”Everything is going to be all right”.

We want to extend our sincere thanks to all who supported us, even as we were unable to satisfy your demand for My Therapy Buddy.  With this new Indiegogo campaign, friends and followers can help us expand production in 2016 to better serve you and grow our help with MTB's around the planet in the years to come.    www.mytherapybuddy.com


MTB empowers you to reach out to people and fill them with joy.


MTB is not for sale in retail stores, and is only available at this exclusive Indiegogo campaign at 20% OFF when you pre-order, as we have been unfortunately out of stock.  Support us here to expanded production for 2016 to better serve you and to help more people worldwide.  Delivery expected in in February of 2016.  

TO ORDER: select a PERK to your right, save 20% (pay no tax or shipping). 

Keep sending videos and photos with Buddy to:    love@mytherapybuddy.com 

          SELECT MTB PERKS TO YOUR RIGHT

                                                   


        Instant Collector items

     Adopt a buddy for a friend,               and one for yourself.




People all over the world cherish their MINI Buddies. They take it along on trips, leave it in their car or office, and always have it there to reassure them that 'Everything is going to be all right.'  We have four delightful colors to choose from.


        

EZ-Find 4" soft Key Fob (non-speaking)

             


COLLECTOR'S Original T-shirt 2016

   

               ADOPT TWINS                

    Send love to a friend and joy             to your favorite charity.

      (We'll donate Buddies in your entity's name, and send you a receipt )

                          If you need assistance:   love@mytherapybuddy.com
               MTB TEAM:  We'll call you back within 24 Hrs   760-693-1914

                                                    

              2016 COLLECTOR                       My Buddy Poster Perk


                   



  CUSTOM CORPORATE BUDDY

                  My Therapy Buddy's will wear your logo on his T-SHIRT


     

  MyTherapyBuddy in the Media


                                            

          

        



                                              

                                                     

 


  WHY does My Therapy Buddy work?


            

Doctors, psychologists and health care professionals have recommended the use of My Therapy Buddy for individuals suffering from depression, anxiety, trauma, or end of life issues.  My Therapy Buddy responds to the squeeze of a person in need, speaking and reassuring them that “Everything is going to be all right”. This phrase creates a cascade of physiological responses in a human body, kicking joy and love into overdrive. As a result, MTB makes the person feel good.

         If you need to contact us:             support@myth  erapybuddy.com




          Frequently AskedQuestions


What is My Therapy Buddy (MTB)?  MTB is a transitional object, in the form of a personal companion primarily designed for the internalization of various maternal-like functions which are considered to be the building blocks of our psychic structure. It’s a wonderfully soft and huggable friend that offers great tactile contact, and provides soothing and comforting words which are beneficial to one’s emotional well being.

What is a transitional object?  Typically, the transitional object is a baby blanket, teddy bear, doll, or stuffed animal cherished by a young child who carries everywhere and sleeps with it for comfort and soothing. There is no reason why this soothing function cannot benefit adults as well. In clinical terms is the halfway point between receiving comfort and nurturing from a mother or other primary caregiver and total reliance on the self. It performs soothing functions and the development of enduring psychic structures which eventually permits self-healing. In everyday language a transitional object taps into the natural self preservation instinct we all have. When we are at our emotionally lowest point and we feel hopeless, there always is a reservoir of resilience inside us. The transitional object can make us aware of this natural self-healing instinct and guide us back to a healthy balance of mind, body, and spirit.

How does MTB Work?  Once in the privacy of your home, or other comfortable location, the soft and huggable companion can be accessed any time you need it. The person being held by MyTherapyBuddy can activate the comforting messages by applying slight pressure to either the right or the left foot. The design, research and development for MTB realized that the shape, materials and the words that MTB speaks are universal signals to the brain that can be accessed by people in distress, any time, any place. We know that almost all of our worst fears are created in our minds, that’s why the very specific words MTB speaks have a positive, calming effect on people in a time of urgent need. After prolonged repeated use, the effect becomes a permanent soothing component in that person’s healing process.                              (See clinical description for specific details)

Who are the people being helped by MTB?  MTB can help most people. Even though MTB is not intended to replace professional counseling, it is meant to be there between therapy sessions, or other ongoing therapeutic counseling. We all have moments when nurturing words can ease our mind, especially from an always available “buddy”.

How much does the 18" MTB cost?  The price is $69.99 plus shipping,  but it can be reduce by 20% on by getting  your buddy here and now from a perk. At the moment the MTB price is about half the cost of one hour of professional therapy.  See more at the www.MyTherapyBuddy.com

      
           Send us your questions                     support@mytherapybuddy.com



   You have more power than you    know to make someone happy. 



                      HISTORY

        



   Theoretical Underpinnings for My Therapy Buddy

                                                 Shari ReVille, Ph.D.

My Therapy Buddy is the result of research based on a major Winnicottian contribution to the theory of personality, the concept of the seemingly universal need of a transitional object. (1954, 1960). Donald Woods Winnicott possessed a profound appreciation for the developmental tasks of life’s earliest stages, and in particular, for the role of “the other”. For Winnicott, the fundamental aspect of human experience, a paradox really, was the need for the other to become one’s self. In a most important paper he points out the fact that the capacity to be alone rests upon the capacity to be alone in the presence of the other (1958). In other words, one cannot speak of “self” without at the same time speaking of the “other”. Winnicott’s best-known concept, the transitional object (1951), has been adopted within the framework of psychotherapy. The transitional object is a halfway point between total reliance on the actual presence of the self-object to perform soothing functions and the development of enduring psychic structures within the self which permits self-soothing. The transitional object in the form of a blanket, imaginary companion, or special toy in childhood allows the child to keep the mother/self object present in the child’s consciousness, even in the absence of the mother. In the same vein, adults who have not been able to internalize a “good object” in childhood, need a soothing self object when experiencing anxiety and or depression. Life transitions precipitate strains within the individual due to the stimulation of existing internal conflicts and heightened disequilibrium between the self and the environment. My Therapy Buddy reduces this strain and allows for the regaining of equilibrium, thus helping individuals to cope with past and present trauma, anxiety, depression, and psychic pain. My Therapy Buddy acts as a vehicle for the “internalization” of various maternal-like functions which are considered to be the building blocks of psychic structure and an “optimal” fit with the environment. Ref. The facilitating Environment Clinical of Donald W. Winncott’s Theory Editors: M. Geraard Fromm, Ph. D. Bruce Lazar Smith, Ph. D., 1989

                           Copyright © 2002/2015 CRE8TRIX DESIGN LLC.


          We appreciate you.

 Continue sending photos and videos.

         love@mytherapybuddy.com

      Now is your turn to make                someone special smile.           TO ORDER: select your PERK to your right and save 20%   
         (By paying no tax or shipping when ordering on Indiegogo)
My Therapy Buddy (MTB) was designed as a drug free method for achieving behavioral modification or stress relief and has been used by thousands of people worldwide since 2002.   MTB is a transitional object, and has been recommended by psychologists and other licensed mental health professionals for over fourteen years.My Therapy Buddy ultimately serves as a therapeutic intervention, used as an accessible, soothing and comforting “person replacement” for those who might need additional support in times of psychological or physical pain and suffering.  MTB can help any individual that has difficulty coping with stress-related, emotional or physical problems.  Buddy is also a great companion for anyone, and people love to hear MTB say  ”Everything is going to be all right”.
We want to extend our sincere thanks to all who supported us, even as we were unable to satisfy your demand for My Therapy Buddy.  With this new Indiegogo campaign, friends and followers can help us expand production in 2016 to better serve you and grow our help with MTB's around the planet in the years to come.    www.mytherapybuddy.com
