story:
What's The Project About?

The purpose of the project is to expand our range by launching some exciting new products we've been working on; giving them a full retail launch, with professionally-designed packaging and all the relevant licencing to get them on high-street shelves and available to purchase globally online.

We have a range of 10 products which have been really well received by our test panel, and we'd like to make them available to everyone. They have already been formulated and tested (on willing human volunteers - never on animals!) and are ready to go. However, as this is a larger scale project than anything we've done previously, we appreciate that this is a significant financial challenge, so we've prioritised 6 of the products for this project with the plan to add the additional products as 'stretch goals' if we reach our target quickly.

The products we've prioritised are as follows:


Smokin' Joints Shea Butter Balm

Our Smokin' Joints range of bath and massage products are some of the most popular in our range. Formulated with clove, rosemary, ginger, cypress and chamomile, they're designed to warm tired muscles and ease aching or arthritic joints, helping to keep them supple and reduce inflammation. However, a lot of the folks who use the range regularly asked us for a balm version, as it would be easier to self-apply on hard-to-reach areas like backs and shoulders than a traditional liquid massage oil.

Our Existing Smokin' Joints Massage Oil

It was originally designed to help ease arthritic and musculoskeletal pain, but our customers tell us it's also a fantastic post-workout rub, as the same properties that keep warmth in joints and muscles to ease stiffness and improve mobility also extend muscle cooldown post-workout, reducing the aches the next day.

The balm is a 100% natural product, made with fairtraded and sustainably sourced ingredients, including organic fairtrade shea butter, cold-pressed olive oil, British beeswax and natural botanical extracts. There are no added colours, perfumes, preservatives or petrochemical ingredients. The balm is suitable for vegetarians.

Now, we could tell you how great we think it is, but we'd rather our customers did that, so here's some feedback from our testers and massage oil customers:

"I have a very dodgy back and I've been using Bimble’s Smokin’ Joints balm for the better part of a year and it's amazing! When my back decides to play up the balm gets the muscles back to cooperating within a day or so. I love the stuff to the point I keep handing it off to friends and family for everything from post workout ouchies to my Dads arthritis... although I always make sure I keep a stock for myself!"

Dawn, Galway

"As someone who's abused her muscles & joints over more years than is sensible, I can hand on heart say that until I found Smokin' Joints I had never found a warming rub that:

1 - Works on both muscles AND joints - muscle rubs don't tend to be robust enough for hands, wrists, knees & ankles, & joint rubs tend to be far too vicious for use on muscles.
2 - Smells nice! Yes, I know, there are more important things, but for me it has to smell good too!
3 - Multi-purpose - I used the oil for large areas (brilliant for back massage... mmm...), knees and hips, and the balm was perfect for hands, feet and the small of my back, plus the balm was fantastic for taking with me everywhere I went, as there was no risk of leaking.
4 - Fantastic value for money - a little goes a very long way.
5 - Knowing the provenance of the product - Being absolutely 100% confident in the quality of the ingredients, that everything has been ethically & sustainably sourced, tested without cruelty, & made as naturally as possible.

You can keep your nasty chemically burny products, I'll stick to the yummy spicy warming Smokin' Joints!"

Jo, Staffordshire


Flower Power Healing Balm


'Flower Power' is designed to lend a hand to skin in crisis! Originally designed for someone whose arm was coming out of a cast, it's been used for everything from dry and itchy skin to soothing skin reactions, wind burn and chapped skin, chafing, contact dermatitis, callouses and even post-operative sites once the stitches had dissolved. It also doubled up as a handy cream for dry skin, especially hands, elbows, knees and feet.

Flower Power Healing Balm

It's incredibly gentle, made from simple, 100% natural ingredients, including cold-pressed rosehip oil, organic fairtrade shea butter, and plenty of soothing and repairing essential oils to help get skin back in shape! There are no added colours, perfumes, preservatives or petrochemical ingredients, and Flower Power is suitable for vegetarians. It also smells delicious!

Here's what some of our testers had to say:

"Flower Power Healing balm took away the itchiness from my healing scar tissue and has become the go-to balm for any skin complaints in our family. From 10 year olds to 74 year olds, the response is the same: this smells amazing and stops the itch giving the skin a chance to heal. It's also a fabulous post shave balm for legs! Why have half a dozen skin creams for different jobs when you can have one?"

Anna, Gloucestershire

"I had a really painful rash which had started as prickly heat, but kept spreading and becoming more inflamed, which I was worried was getting infected. Conventional antiseptic cream was doing nothing, so I was pleased to try Flower Power instead. It was so gentle, instantly soothed the pain and itch, and the rash itself was completely gone in a few days. I'm now using it on annoying dry patches on my elbows, knees and heels, and its doing wonders for them, too!"

Helen, West Yorkshire

                                                                                                                                 

The Derminator Skin Repair Serum


'The Derminator' really is bringing out the 'big guns' when it comes to fixing skin stuff! A gentle, natural serum in an easy-to-use spray, The Derminator is packed with 15 different botanicals, and designed to soothe even the angriest skin, including eczema, dermatitis, psoriasis and skin reactions. Packed with some of nature's best ingredients from around the World, including cold-pressed rosehip oil, Moroccan argan oil, fairtrade jojoba, evening primrose seed oil and organic fairtrade shea and cocoa butters, and enriched with natural Vitamin E and St Johns Wort; The Derminator is our most technically advanced product to date.

It's designed to even out skin tone, and reduce the appearance of stretch marks and scars over time, and has been challenge tested against some of the market-leading products with much higher price tags with excellent results (can you tell we're really proud of this one?). It's 100% natural, with no added colours, perfumes, preservatives or petrochemical ingredients, and is suitable for vegans.

Here's what some of our testers had to say:

"My hands are prone to drying out of the skin, leading to dermatitis, when exposed to cold/wet for prolonged periods of time. I was lucky enough to be trialling Bimble’s 'Derminator' oil during a recent camping/kayaking holiday and at the first sign of dryness across my knuckles started applying it to my hands. Not only did it prevent the problem progressing any further, it also cleared up the dryness that had already occurred. Would definitely recommend!" 
Sami, North-East Lincolnshire

"I had a chafing rash under my boobs from an allergic reaction to fabric softener that was taking forever to go away. In fact it wasn't going away on its own and I was using coconut oil but all that did was treat the itching. Well it's gone now thanks to this oil. In about two weeks - all healed.

I also noticed that my stretch marks don’t feel as bumpy I have some bad ones on my tummy under my navel and it feels less like serious tears in my skin. I notice the ones on my stomach are blending in skin tone wise, they are still there but they are less light coloured, in just 2 weeks. Given that I think they show up more on black skin, this is an achievement!

The way things are going I think six months of continuous use would repair my skin drastically. The product surpassed my expectations. I am so happy about the chafing healing, it was really an issue that I did not want to use medication for. Thank you!"

Juanita, St Lucia


"I've used Bimble products before, so expected it to be good. But the serum far surpassed my expectations. It worked far better than any similar products I've used in the past too. I saw some definite changes within just a few days on several skin issues & the results lasted even after I stopped using the oil. I've already re-ordered it and would highly recommend."

Claire, Dublin


"The oil is brilliant, it's helped my soften my scars, becoming less painful and my stretch/weight loss marks have shrunk by about a quarter and still have plenty oil in the bottle. It really is a good recipe and its vegan.

My partner burned her finger badly a week ago and the new skin kept drying out badly and healing up tight so she used some of the oil and it became more supple, and the damage is healing a lot faster now."

Tony, Northumberland


New Lip Scrubs!


Our fairtrade, organic lip scrubs are our best-selling products hands-down. Currently available in ten mouth-watering flavours, we want to shake up the range and add some new delicious varieties: nostalgic Cola Bottle and luxurious Salted Caramel! Our current lip scrub customers come back time and again for a completely natural and organic product at half the price of the market-leading brand and, if you haven't tried them, we know you'll love them!

The Existing Lip Scrub Range

Simply put a tiny amount on your finger, and use it to gently scrub off leftover lipstick and flaky bits from your lips. When you're done, you can just lick off the leftovers: the most delicious part of any beauty routine! Made with organic fairtrade cane sugar, cold-pressed olive oil and fairtrade soothing jojoba, we're pretty sure we can convert you to our cute little lip treats!

Here's some feedback from some of our hundreds of lip scrub fans!

"The formula is perfect because the grains in the scrub are not too big - they are the perfect size so you don't feel like you are scrubbing your lips to the bone...it smells and tastes like actual fruit. When you smell them you just want to eat them!” 

'Make-up Is Life' Beauty Blog Review

“This is absolutely FANTASTIC! It is a great exfoliator and really gets rid of any dead skin on lips. It smells amazing and is organic and Fairtrade - what more could you want?”

Jessica, Yorkshire

"I ordered the Turkish Delight Lip Scrub last week and absolutely LOVE it. My lips are the softest and smoothest they have been in ages...The taste is incredible. Sweet and delicious.”

5 Star Amazon Customer Review 

"The new Cola Bottle flavour tastes of nostalgia, and got my lips smooth after a week of working outside!"

Ellinor, Leeds
"As a matte lipstick wearer, my lips can become dry and flaky. If I'm feeling nervous I peel the skin off them and cause damage to the fresh skin underneath. I've been using the Bimble lip scrubs for a few weeks now and I haven't had any issues with dry lips. I just apply the scrub and use a balm over the top for days when I don't wear lipstick. And for the days I do, it's a good little rescuer for after I've been wearing matte lipstick all day. It tastes great and doesn't have a chemical smell to it, as its al natural. It's completely edible and cruelty free, which is important as an animal lover. I'd recommend these to anyone who needs a little lip TLC."
Harry, Lancashire


Swindler's Secret Oil


'Swindler's Secret' started life as a 14th century recipe, when it was still believed that 'bad smells' were the cause of  infection. The solution at the time was to mask bad odours. It was discovered by trial and error that certain scents were more effective than others, even though they didn't have the scientific capability to learn why. We now know that it's because certain substances have antimicrobial properties and, because diseases are caused by pathogens which are killed by some of these substances, 'scents' can prevent certain airborne infections.

This learning was of use to grave robbers - also known as  'body snatchers'. As human dissection was largely illegal, scientists, doctors and anatomy lecturers had to find alternative means of securing remains for scientific use, hence the use of 'body snatchers'.

Swindler's Secret Botanicals

To protect themselves, 'body snatchers' are said to have used an aromatic blend to prevent the 'bad smells' making them ill, and many versions of this formula still exist today. Modern scientific peer-reviewed trials of this formula have shown that it kills a huge number of bacteria, viruses and fungi,  including otherwise resilient 'superbugs' like MRSA and C.Diff.

We've taken the original formula and made some slight amendments, maintaining the 'bug bashing' properties, but adding natural bronchodialators and decongestant to expand its potential uses, making it ideal for colds, 'flu, sinus and respiratory infections and similar problems, as well as to aid controlling the symptoms of asthma and even CF (in conjunction with conventional therapies). It can also be used as a topical antiseptic.

Our formula is 100% natural, suitable for vegans and made with pure botanical extracts only. Here's what some of our testers had to say:

"As an asthmatic, I am prone to chest infections which can have serious consequences. Using the Swindler's Secret Oil with steam inhalation has proved very effective at stopping infections in their tracks as well as being a comforting and pleasant way to ease the breathing."

Su, Bristol

"I got this cold, which turned into a chest infection, which turned into another chest infection (quite frankly, it was just ongoing for weeks and weeks). The doctor had given me so many different antibiotics that I felt I was rattling, and yet it just kept coming back, or probably never went away. I jumped at the chance to try Swindler's Secret (quite frankly, I'd have tried anything at that point), and my symptoms were gone after a week of daily use. The bottle now has a permanent place in my medicine cabinet, and comes out at the first sign of a sniffle. I've also used it to sterilise cuts I've picked up working outdoors, and it's a lot more pleasant to use than liquid antiseptic - it smells nice and doesn't sting!"
Steve, Lancashire 

Risks and Challenges


The risks and challenges associated with this project are very low - we have developed these products quite extensively before setting up this project. We already have the packaging designs in progress, the products tested with lab approvals pending, and the materials suppliers in place. Additionally, we have already vetted suppliers regarding animal testing and sustainability of supply, as well as environmental assessments, all in accordance with our company environmental and social responsibility policies.

We have secondary sources of supply for everything from the packaging and printers to the ingredients suppliers, so there are contingencies in place should we experience any difficulties with supply.

Our only potential issue is meeting deadlines if we get a much larger response than we anticipate but, rest assured, we'll be working around the clock to make sure everyone gets their rewards as soon as the project closes, and certainly within the stated delivery times.

Other Ways you Can Help


You might not be able to contribute to the campaign right now, and we completely understand. However, you can still help us get the word out about the project, so please feel free to share the link to this project (Indiegogo even provides some handy tools on this page to make that easier!), spam your friends, annoy your colleagues, post about us on Facebook, Tweet about the project - you'd be amazed at how much it helps!


Finally...


If you have any questions, please get in touch. If you want to take part but the rewards aren't what you're looking for, again let us know and we can see about adding something suitable - whether you have specific Christmas gift requirements or want to buy a certain quantity of a particular product, we can create a custom reward to suit your needs. If there's something in the reward package you select that you don't want (for instance, if you don't have a bathtub), then you're welcome to switch for an alternative product. All rewards will be with you in plenty of time for Christmas, in case you're planning on making your reward/s a gift for someone.  

For those who might not be familiar with us or our products, please note that we are not a pharmaceutical company - we make wellbeing and body care products under EU cosmetics licensing and regulations, and make no medical claims for any of them. If you have a medical condition, please consult with your doctor, pharmacist or healthcare provider.


  Above all, thanks for your time - we hope you like what you see and will back us, and share our project with any friends and associates who might be interested.


Update: 10th October 2015

Firstly, thanks so much for your incredible support! I'm thrilled to say that we have exceeded our initial target already! So, as promised, we're going to seek to introduce the four 'stretch goal' products, if we're able to raise enough to cover the costs. 

Having taken a survey of customers through our Facebook page, the first we're going to add are two clay-based wash-off cleansers, one for oily and combination skin, and one for normal to dry skin, so there's something for everyone.

It will cost us an additional £300 to add these products to the laboratory test programme and packaging origination, so we'll be able to include them if the total raised exceeds £1600. If we reach this stretch target, then we'll look at the next product choice.

The products are as follows:


French Polish


French polish is designed to thoroughly cleanse oily and combination skin, reducing oiliness without aggressively stripping out moisture, and cleansing right down to the pores. 


French Polish is made with French green clay to deep-cleanse pores, glycerine to soothe and protect skin, oatmeal to gently exfoliate,  coconut oil to remove dirt and impurities, naturally-occurring alpha hydroxy acids to help renew skin and get rid of the dead skin cells which can block pores and dull the complexion, fairtrade Moroccan argan oil to balance skin moisture levels, and lemon and lavender to help reduce the bacteria which cause pimples and break-outs, remove excess oil and aid in healing spots and skin damage.


Three King Awesome


Three King Awesome takes it's name from the frankincense essential oil which not only gives it its delicious aroma, but helps to soothe and protect dry and damaged skin. It's designed to nourish skin, gently cleansing without stripping away essential moisture.

Three King Awesome is made with fine bentonite clay to deep-cleanse pores, glycerine to soothe and protect skin, ground almonds to gently exfoliate without the harsh nature of so many exfoliants,  coconut oil to remove dirt and impurities, shea butter to add moisture to parched skin, and rose geranium and frankincense to soothe, heal and protect skin, leaving it soft, smooth, moisturised, supple and protected from everyday stresses.

Both cleansers are designed as 'dual-purpose' products: they are gentle enough to be used daily as cleansers by wetting skin, taking a small piece (the size of a hazelnut) and gently massaging into the skin before rinsing away; but they can also be used as a periodic 'deep clean' treatment, by placing a thin layer onto the face as a mask and leaving on for 10 minutes before massaging to exfoliate and then rinsing away.

Both cleansers are made with 100% natural ingredients, suitable for vegans, and are gentle enough for sensitive skin. They contain no parabens, artificial colours or perfumes, no mineral oil which can clog pores, and no harsh detergents which can strip skin of vital oils. 


Update: 12th October 2015


Wow! That was really quick! We've already exceeded our first 'stretch goal', so the two clay cleansers are definitely going ahead! As we've reached this so quickly, here's our next goal. It will cost us an additional £200 to add the 'Headrush' scalp treatment oil to the laboratory test programme and packaging origination, so we'll be able to include it as well if the total raised exceeds £1800. If we reach this stretch target, then we'll look at the next product choice, which is....

Headrush Scalp Treatment Oil


'Headrush' is a gentle, soothing treatment oil for itchy, flaky scalps, dandruff and other similar skin complaints. It's a light, gentle treatment oil which is designed to reduce itching, moisturise, help destroy bacterial and fungal causes of itching and flakiness, and reduce dandruff. 

Made with soothing and nourishing jojoba, coconut, rosehip, hemp and olive oils, and fortified with natural Vitamin E, rosemary, lavender, tea tree, St John's wort, West Indian bay, hyssop, juniper and chamomile botanical extracts, Headrush is easy to use and leaves skin moisturised, soothed and smooth and hair supple, shiny and easy to manage without greasiness. To use, massage thoroughly into scalp, leave  on for at least half an hour, then shampoo out.   

The treatment oil is made with 100% natural ingredients, suitable for vegans, and is gentle enough for sensitive scalps. It contains no parabens, artificial colours or perfumes, no mineral oil and no detergents which can strip skin and hair of vital oils and make flakiness worse. 

Update: 16th October 2015

As we're so close to our second stretch goal, we've added the penultimate one below. It will cost us an additional £200 to add the 'Hippification' depth charge fizzy bath treats to our existing range, so we'll be able to include it as well if the total raised exceeds £2,000. If we reach this stretch target, then not only will we be able to make these little '60s tribute baths, but we'll have an extra gift for you all as a thank you. You can add the Hippification depth charges to you pledge choices, as we've added a new reward to the 'perks' page, but, if we reach the £2,000 target, then we'll include a FREE Hippification depth charge (or one from our existing range if you prefer) to your reward package for all contributors who pledge £35 or more in total.

Hippification Depth Charge Fizzy Bath Treats


Hippification may as well be a '60s tribute act! Forget your fancy blends of complementary oils, this just has ALL the patchouli! Never mind beads in its hair, it should probably come with it's own Jimi Hendrix Experience LP!
 

As with our current Depth Charge collection, they'll be available individually and in packs of 3. As well as enough patchouli to start a Grateful Dead convention, it's also packed with lots of lovely moisturising and skin softening cocoa butter, and absolutely no parabens, artificial colours or perfumes, no mineral oil and no detergents, making it ideal for those with sensitive skin who may not be able to use many mass-produced bath bombs.

Immuni-Tea Herbal Infusion


Immuni-Tea is our final stretch goal. It's a light, refreshing blend of sencha green tea, echinacea, astragalus, ginkgo biloba, ginseng, cat's claw and lemon, and flavoured with bergamot for a delicious 'earl grey' taste. Used regularly, it can help support a healthy immune system and help give your body the tools to fight off the winter bugs! It's tasty and easy to make, and has no artificial additives whatsoever - just sustainably-sourced natural herbs, fruits and extracts.


Update: Summer 2016

The project's success has been fantastic and, thanks to our backers, all of the products we aimed to launch have been available on general sale now for a fair few months on our website, on the shelves at our 5 high street distributors, and via our webstores here, and on Etsy, Amazon and EBay. All of the products are held in stock, and we are now shipping the 'In Demand' packages within 1 working day of order placement.

So, here are the finished products:
story_txt:
What's The Project About?

The purpose of the project is to expand our range by launching some exciting new products we've been working on; giving them a full retail launch, with professionally-designed packaging and all the relevant licencing to get them on high-street shelves and available to purchase globally online.
We have a range of 10 products which have been
really well received by our test panel, and we'd like to make them available to
everyone. They have already been formulated and tested (on willing human volunteers - never on
animals!) and are ready to go.  However, as this is a larger scale project than anything we've done previously, we appreciate that this is a significant financial challenge, so we've prioritised 6 of the products for this project with the plan to add
the additional products as 'stretch goals' if we reach our target quickly. 
The products we've prioritised are as follows:
Smokin' Joints Shea Butter Balm
Our Smokin' Joints range of bath and massage products are some of the most popular in our range. Formulated with clove, rosemary, ginger, cypress and chamomile, they're designed to warm tired muscles and ease aching or arthritic joints, helping to keep them supple and reduce inflammation. However, a lot of the folks who use the range regularly asked us for a balm version, as it would be easier to self-apply on hard-to-reach areas like backs and shoulders than a traditional liquid massage oil.


Our Existing Smokin' Joints Massage Oil

It was originally designed to help ease arthritic and musculoskeletal pain, but our customers tell us it's also a fantastic post-workout rub, as the same properties that keep warmth in joints and muscles to ease stiffness and improve mobility also extend muscle cooldown post-workout, reducing the aches the next day.
The balm is a 100% natural product, made with fairtraded and sustainably sourced ingredients, including organic fairtrade shea butter, cold-pressed olive oil, British beeswax and natural botanical extracts. There are no added colours, perfumes, preservatives or petrochemical ingredients. The balm is suitable for vegetarians.
Now, we could tell you how great we think it is, but we'd rather our customers did that, so here's some feedback from our testers and massage oil customers:
"I have a very dodgy back and I've been using Bimble’s Smokin’ Joints balm for the better part of a year and it's amazing! When my back decides to play up the balm gets the muscles back to cooperating within a day or so. I love the stuff to the point I keep handing it off to friends and family for everything from post workout ouchies to my Dads arthritis... although I always make sure I keep a stock for myself!"
Dawn, Galway


"As someone who's abused her muscles & joints over more years than is sensible, I can hand on heart say that until I found Smokin' Joints I had never found a warming rub that:
1 - Works on both muscles AND joints - muscle rubs don't tend to be robust enough for hands, wrists, knees & ankles, & joint rubs tend to be far too vicious for use on muscles.2 - Smells nice! Yes, I know, there are more important things, but for me it has to smell good too!3 - Multi-purpose - I used the oil for large areas (brilliant for back massage... mmm...), knees and hips, and the balm was perfect for hands, feet and the small of my back, plus the balm was fantastic for taking with me everywhere I went, as there was no risk of leaking.4 - Fantastic value for money - a little goes a very long way.5 - Knowing the provenance of the product - Being absolutely 100% confident in the quality of the ingredients, that everything has been ethically & sustainably sourced, tested without cruelty, & made as naturally as possible.You can keep your nasty chemically burny products, I'll stick to the yummy spicy warming Smokin' Joints!"
Jo, Staffordshire




Smokin' Joints Depth Charge Fizzy Bath Treats

Flower Power Healing Balm
'Flower Power' is designed to lend a hand to skin in crisis! Originally designed for someone whose arm was coming out of a cast, it's been used for everything from dry and itchy skin to soothing skin reactions, wind burn and chapped skin, chafing, contact dermatitis, callouses and even post-operative sites once the stitches had dissolved. It also doubled up as a handy cream for dry skin, especially hands, elbows, knees and feet.

Flower Power Healing BalmIt's incredibly gentle, made from simple, 100% natural ingredients, including cold-pressed rosehip oil, organic fairtrade shea butter, and plenty of soothing and repairing essential oils to help get skin back in shape! There are no added colours, perfumes, preservatives or petrochemical ingredients, and Flower Power is suitable for vegetarians. It also smells delicious!
Here's what some of our testers had to say:
"Flower Power Healing balm took away the itchiness from my healing scar tissue and has become the go-to balm for any skin complaints in our family. From 10 year olds to 74 year olds, the response is the same: this smells amazing and stops the itch giving the skin a chance to heal. It's also a fabulous post shave balm for legs! Why have half a dozen skin creams for different jobs when you can have one?"
Anna, Gloucestershire

"I had a really painful rash which had started as prickly heat, but kept spreading and becoming more inflamed, which I was worried was getting infected. Conventional antiseptic cream was doing nothing, so I was pleased to try Flower Power instead. It was so gentle, instantly soothed the pain and itch, and the rash itself was completely gone in a few days. I'm now using it on annoying dry patches on my elbows, knees and heels, and its doing wonders for them, too!"
Helen, West Yorkshire                                                                                                                                 

The Derminator Skin Repair Serum
'The Derminator' really is bringing out the 'big guns' when it comes to fixing skin stuff! A gentle, natural serum in an easy-to-use spray, The Derminator is packed with 15 different botanicals, and designed to soothe even the angriest skin, including eczema, dermatitis, psoriasis and skin reactions. Packed with some of nature's best ingredients from around the World, including cold-pressed rosehip oil, Moroccan argan oil, fairtrade jojoba, evening primrose seed oil and organic fairtrade shea and cocoa butters, and enriched with natural Vitamin E and St Johns Wort; The Derminator is our most technically advanced product to date.


It's designed to even out skin tone, and reduce the appearance of stretch marks and scars over time, and has been challenge tested against some of the market-leading products with much higher price tags with excellent results (can you tell we're really proud of this one?). It's 100% natural, with no added colours, perfumes, preservatives or petrochemical ingredients, and is suitable for vegans.Here's what some of our testers had to say:"My hands are prone to drying out of the skin, leading to dermatitis, when exposed to cold/wet for prolonged periods of time. I was lucky enough to be trialling Bimble’s 'Derminator' oil during a recent camping/kayaking holiday and at the first sign of dryness across my knuckles started applying it to my hands. Not only did it prevent the problem progressing any further, it also cleared up the dryness that had already occurred. Would definitely recommend!" Sami, North-East Lincolnshire
"I had a chafing rash under my boobs from an allergic reaction to fabric softener that was taking forever to go away. In fact it wasn't going away on its own and I was using coconut oil but all that did was treat the itching. Well it's gone now thanks to this oil. In about two weeks - all healed.I also noticed that my stretch marks don’t feel as bumpy I have some bad ones on my tummy under my navel and it feels less like serious tears in my skin. I notice the ones on my stomach are blending in skin tone wise, they are still there but they are less light coloured, in just 2 weeks. Given that I think they show up more on black skin, this is an achievement!
The way things are going I think six months of continuous use would repair my skin drastically. The product surpassed my expectations. I am so happy about the chafing healing, it was really an issue that I did not want to use medication for. Thank you!"
Juanita, St Lucia
"I've used Bimble products before, so expected it to be good. But the serum far surpassed my expectations. It worked far better than any similar products I've used in the past too. I saw some definite changes within just a few days on several skin issues & the results lasted even after I stopped using the oil. I've already re-ordered it and would highly recommend."
Claire, Dublin
"The oil is brilliant, it's helped my soften my scars, becoming less painful and my stretch/weight loss marks have shrunk by about a quarter and still have plenty oil in the bottle. It really is a good recipe and its vegan.
My partner burned her finger badly a week ago and the new skin kept drying out badly and healing up tight so she used some of the oil and it became more supple, and the damage is healing a lot faster now."
Tony, Northumberland

New Lip Scrubs!

Our fairtrade, organic lip scrubs are our best-selling products hands-down. Currently available in ten mouth-watering flavours, we want to shake up the range and add some new delicious varieties: nostalgic Cola Bottle and luxurious Salted Caramel! Our current lip scrub customers come back time and again for a completely natural and organic product at half the price of the market-leading brand and, if you haven't tried them, we know you'll love them!

The Existing Lip Scrub RangeSimply put a tiny amount on your finger, and use it to gently scrub off leftover lipstick and flaky bits from your lips. When you're done, you can just lick off the leftovers: the most delicious part of any beauty routine! Made with organic fairtrade cane sugar, cold-pressed olive oil and fairtrade soothing jojoba, we're pretty sure we can convert you to our cute little lip treats!
Here's some feedback from some of our hundreds of lip scrub fans!
"The formula is perfect because the grains in the scrub are not too big - they are the perfect size so you don't feel like you are scrubbing your lips to the bone...it smells and tastes like actual fruit. When you smell them you just want to eat them!” 
'Make-up Is Life' Beauty Blog Review
“This is absolutely FANTASTIC! It is a great exfoliator and really gets rid of any dead skin on lips. It smells amazing and is organic and Fairtrade - what more could you want?”
Jessica, Yorkshire
"I ordered the Turkish Delight Lip Scrub last week and absolutely LOVE it. My lips are the softest and smoothest they have been in ages...The taste is incredible. Sweet and delicious.”
5 Star Amazon Customer Review 
"The new Cola Bottle flavour tastes of nostalgia, and got my lips smooth after a week of working outside!"
Ellinor, Leeds
"As a matte lipstick wearer, my lips can become dry and flaky. If I'm feeling nervous I peel the skin off them and cause damage to the fresh skin underneath. I've been using the Bimble lip scrubs for a few weeks now and I haven't had any issues with dry lips. I just apply the scrub and use a balm over the top for days when I don't wear lipstick. And for the days I do, it's a good little rescuer for after I've been wearing matte lipstick all day. It tastes great and doesn't have a chemical smell to it, as its al natural. It's completely edible and cruelty free, which is important as an animal lover. I'd recommend these to anyone who needs a little lip TLC."Harry, Lancashire

Swindler's Secret Oil


'Swindler's Secret' started life as a 14th century recipe, when it was still believed that 'bad smells' were the cause of  infection. The solution at the time was to mask bad odours. It was discovered by trial and error that certain scents were more effective than others, even though they didn't have the scientific capability to learn why. We now know that it's because certain substances have antimicrobial properties and, because diseases are caused by pathogens which are killed by some of these substances, 'scents' can prevent certain airborne infections.
This learning was of use to grave robbers - also known as  'body snatchers'. As human dissection was largely illegal, scientists, doctors and anatomy lecturers had to find alternative means of securing remains for scientific use, hence the use of 'body snatchers'.

Swindler's Secret Botanicals
To protect themselves, 'body snatchers' are said to have used an aromatic blend to prevent the 'bad smells' making them ill, and many versions of this formula still exist today. Modern scientific peer-reviewed trials of this formula have shown that it kills a huge number of bacteria, viruses and fungi,  including otherwise resilient 'superbugs' like MRSA and C.Diff.
We've taken the original formula and made some slight amendments, maintaining the 'bug bashing' properties, but adding natural bronchodialators and decongestant to expand its potential uses, making it ideal for colds, 'flu, sinus and respiratory infections and similar problems, as well as to aid controlling the symptoms of asthma and even CF (in conjunction with conventional therapies). It can also be used as a topical antiseptic.
Our formula is 100% natural, suitable for vegans and made with pure botanical extracts only. Here's what some of our testers had to say:"As an asthmatic, I am prone to chest infections which can have serious consequences. Using the Swindler's Secret Oil with steam inhalation has proved very effective at stopping infections in their tracks as well as being a comforting and pleasant way to ease the breathing."
Su, Bristol
"I got this cold, which turned into a chest infection, which turned into another chest infection (quite frankly, it was just ongoing for weeks and weeks). The doctor had given me so many different antibiotics that I felt I was rattling, and yet it just kept coming back, or probably never went away. I jumped at the chance to try Swindler's Secret (quite frankly, I'd have tried anything at that point), and my symptoms were gone after a week of daily use. The bottle now has a permanent place in my medicine cabinet, and comes out at the first sign of a sniffle. I've also used it to sterilise cuts I've picked up working outdoors, and it's a lot more pleasant to use than liquid antiseptic - it smells nice and doesn't sting!"Steve, Lancashire

The risks and challenges associated with this project are very low - we have developed these products quite extensively before setting up this project. We already have the packaging designs in progress, the products tested with lab approvals pending, and the materials suppliers in place. Additionally, we have already vetted suppliers regarding animal testing and sustainability of supply, as well as environmental assessments, all in accordance with our company environmental and social responsibility policies.
We have secondary sources of supply for everything from the packaging and printers to the ingredients suppliers, so there are contingencies in place should we experience any difficulties with supply.
Our only potential issue is meeting deadlines if we get a much larger response than we anticipate but, rest assured, we'll be working around the clock to make sure everyone gets their rewards as soon as the project closes, and certainly within the stated delivery times.

However, you can still help us get the word out about the project, so please feel free to share the link to this project (Indiegogo even provides some handy tools on this page to make that easier!), spam your friends, annoy your colleagues, post about us on Facebook, Tweet about the project - you'd be amazed at how much it helps!Finally...

It's tasty and easy to make, and has no artificial additives whatsoever - just sustainably-sourced natural herbs, fruits and extracts.


Update: Summer 2016
The project's success has been fantastic and, thanks to our backers, all of the products we aimed to launch have been available on general sale now for a fair few months on our website, on the shelves at our 5 high street distributors, and via our webstores here, and on Etsy, Amazon and EBay. All of the products are held in stock, and we are now shipping the 'In Demand' packages within 1 working day of order placement.So, here are the finished products:

story: Turner Tender Care is a licensed assisted living home that provides professional home care services for those that might require assistance with daily living. We are a not-for-profit organization (501(c)(3). Turner Tender Care is the dream of Mother Turner, 94, a member of The Church of God fellowship group. Mother Turner was pleased with the care provided to her by its members before she passed, and left her home for the continued care of others. The completion, opening and operation of this home has been a significant and needed service in the community. Turner Tender Care is launching this fundraising campaign towards cost of buying and installing a sprinkler system. The sprinkler system will help Turner Tender Care increase capacity to meet the growing need for affordable, space and place for indidivuals who find living independently difficult. We are asking all that come to this site, to donate a minimum of a $10.00 towards this goal. We are also asking that you spread the news of our need to others. We are excited about this campaign, and pray that you will join with us, by giving, as we reach out to serve others. God Bless.

story:
This is a small portion of such a heart wrenching story. My name is Jasmine, and this story begins with my Papa Jody.

Papa is currently on life support at the UCI Medical Hospital in California. He is in the NICU because he has a severe brain injury, which has caused him to be unresponsive and lifeless. We believe that Papa could have been a victim of the "knock out game". (This sick and twisted game where people knock other people unconscious for "fun").

Now, my family has to come to the terms that it is time to let Papa live in a better world than this one. They have decided to "pull the plug", and it has been the hardest decision to understand and come to terms with. They have given me time to get to California before Papa is officially gone for good.

At this point, I am in a huge predicament. It is after Christmas, and I am completely broke. I am struggling on bills and plane tickets are over $600. If you know me well, you know that I HATE asking for anything from people, let alone money. But I would do anything to have one last good-bye with my Papa and to attend his funeral.

I am asking to get as close to $700 as possible, so I can comfortably buy a ticket after fees and taxes. Please, help me achieve my goal and get to California before it is too late. Any amount helps, whether it is $0.50 or $100. Anything that you can offer is more than enough, please share my story because it means the world to me that you read it.


Thank you all,

Jasmine Almaraz

story:
Our Goal

Amelia is a second grader in Columbia, South Carolina. She was diagnosed with a brain tumor, and had surgery to remove it. However, she must receive chemotherapy each day, and for this she is called Brave Amelia. Every kid has wishes, and some of hers include:

  • Learning to shoot a bow and arrow,
  • Riding in a hot air balloon,
  • Visiting the American Girl store in Atlanta, GA, and
  • Meeting Merida from Disney's Brave

Any additional funds collected would be used to help with the expansive medical bills required for such intense treatment.

Let's Make a Deal

This project began at Lake Carolina Elementary School and was also adopted by Ridge View High School in Columbia. Chandler Bailey, a student of the latter, heard of the fundraiser, and immediately wanted to make a large impact. He had to take it to the next level to give an innocent girl what her heart truly wanted.

Contribute, and you will receive many thanks from both the members of the BioHealth Magnet at Ridge View, who are all very hard-working and intelligent individuals, as well as the appreciation of everyone that properly represents the community of Columbia.

  • All money collected (hopefully at least $2,100) will be given through the schools to Amelia's family
  • Donors will receive personally made tokens of appreciation from various and/or multiple students in the aforementioned magnet program.
  • As a flexible funding project, we would like to use every penny to make Amelia's life better! Give what you can, that's all that we are able to ask for!

Can't Donate? Help spread the word!

We understand if conditions don't allow you to monetarily contribute to this project. Out of good will, please share and spread this project as much as you possibly can regardless.

story:
Short Summary

Hey there! My name is Jayne. I am a young transsexual lady from New York City. on April 5th I was chosen as one of 4 women to receive a once in a lifetime opportunity of receiving Genital Reconstruction Surgery (GRS) on May 13th for free. GRS had always seemed like an unattainable goal in my life, and I feel so extremely blessed for the opportunity I have been given! However because of the suddenness of this amazing opportunity I have not been able to save money for many of the fringe expenses that I need to take care of such as Dr. appointments for surgery clearance, anesthesia, transportation and lodging etc. and none of these expenses are covered under insurance. Plus I will not be able to work for a month while I am in recovery. So I am reaching out to others for support.  

What We Need & What You Get

Anesthesiologist- $1,500

Dr. and Lab fees- $400

Recovery care supplies- $200

Lodging- $160

Total = $2,260

Current funds saved = $800

Goal = $1,460

The Impact

For myself, like many trans women GRS has been a life long goal. The new found sovereignty in my body that this change would give me is a dream come true. I know that this surgery will not solve all of my problems. What it will do for me though is allow me to finally feel at home completely in my skin. To check in and enjoy my body instead of check out and avoid it. To look at my body as a home instead of a battleground. To go through my days and be able to focus on what's going on in front of me, instead of being constantly concerned about bulges or awkward bathroom adventures. Just the feeling of having my body at an all time uncomplicated.

Other Ways You Can Help

Times are tough and I get it (trust me I get it). Please do not feel any obligation to contribute financially. Even if you could just send me warm thoughts and vibes, or get the word out I would really appreciate it!!

story:
Players2Fans: Connecting Fans with their favorite Athletes.

P2F will connect half a billion sports fans with their favorite athletes in one place in real time.

SPORTS FANS!! ARE YOU READY FOR SOMETHING DIFFERENT?! MAINSTREAM MEDIA GOT YOU DOWN?? READ ON: 

 

We are sports fans! We want to find our FAVORITE Athletes on line, in ONE place. A website where Athletes share everything they are willing to share. Where Athletes are not misrepresented in the Press. Where we can get the REAL story. See what they do OFF of the field. Where we can access Insider Experiences with our favorite athletes. Join teams that our Favorite Athletes Sponsor. Get Exclusive Merchandise. Follow Twitter/Facebook/Instagram from ONE Place. players2fans.com IS that one place. FANS, we can make this HAPPEN!

Who We Are

Keith Fitzpatrick and Bobby Amore are Sports Fans and they remember how hard it was, as kids, to get close to their sports heroes and how difficult it is today to get real, unbiased information straight from the pros. They met on the hockey rink and grew an idea about how fans and athletes interact into a full-fledged website that enables fans to connect directly with the players they can’t get enough of. They believe Players2Fans.comTM will change the way the world experiences sports.

Your contribution will support the giant cost of launching a website and keeping it operational; paying the programmers so it doesn’t crash; getting the mobile app finished because you know you will be using your phone; paying the server; ALL of stuff that comes up and has to paid for in order to keep a great business going. We are not kidding; we need you! The website is built, the players are committed and the programmer is waiting. We are ready to LAUNCH!

 

What We Need & What You Get

In this day and age, with the thousands of nascent new media services and fans as rabid and vocal as ever, we at P2F think it's possible to hear every sound bite, see every play from every angle, and experience every moment like never before. By taking advantage of social networking, and relying on the wisdom of the masses, P2F is able to remove the filter established by the few giant corporations currently controlling sports content. We are here to offer a different experience than the likes of ESPN and Yahoo Sports, and give the fans access to everything that the pros will share, straight from the pros.

As contributors to our Indiegogo Campaign you will become a member of the P2F Booster Club, exclusive to this campaign. There are great perks at every level and everyone will see their name on the P2F website on the exclusive P2F Booster Club Roster. You might choose a Limited Edition P2F  T Shirt or an Authentic Signed Jersey. You might want to attend the P2FLaunch Party in New York. How about NBA tickets AND meeting an NBA Star after the game?! Or maybe you are a weekend warrior and want to be a Spartan Race or Rock and Roll Marathon P2F Team Member!

We’ve got it All!

 

The Impact

When P2F.com goes LIVE it will provide a place for athletes and fans to come together, where athletes will share their view, in their words, and will offer their fans experiences AND an experience they can’t get anywhere else. You will make this happen, YOU!

P2F allows professionals to directly deliver information to their fans via blog posts, videos, insider pictures and more. Offering an unbiased look into their lives, on and off their respective fields of play, fans receive their information straight from the players and are able to interact with both their favorite athletes and with each other via the site's forums, fantasy teams, and a lot more.

The company has been highlighted in many area of the press.  The International Business Times has written an article on how we are changing the face of social media in sports. Additionally, we have partnered with Funny or Die to produce a quite amusing video with Anthony Morrow. You will find the links in the gallery.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot give money you can STILL HELP in other ways! GET THE WORD OUT! Use the Indiegogo Tools and SHARE, SHARE, SHARE!! It will have a HUGE impact! THANK YOU!!! And if you love Instagram we are on there too, @players2fans

When You Do Contribute: You can use your Credit Card or PayPal. You can use PayPal even if you don’t have an account of your own.

story:
Brian Walker was born in Indiana and attended Berea College in Kentucky. He is a humourous, compassionate, and inspirational individual whose goals are centered around helping others and pursuing his creative dreams. Brian also seeks truth and health in all aspects of life. He has been living in Carrboro, North Carolina for nearly twenty years and works full time to make ends meet, but is facing a large sum of hospital bills after his battle with cancer.

In early 2010, Brian began feeling sick. He resisted going to a doctor, remembering the death of his grandfather due to surgical negligance and, subsequently, his grandmother's death from cancer. He continued working, but felt so weak that he frequently had to sit down. Finally, his friends insisted on taking him to the hospital.

Brian discovered he had a cancerous tumor in his kidney and fluid in his lungs. He was also extremely anemic. During that summer, he underwent surgery and extensive chemotherapy. The months he spent in and out of the hospital were the most miserable and painful of his life. Brian is grateful for his friends who helped him through this difficult period. Today, the tumor in his kidney has shrunk and is no longer life-threatening.

Brian's loved ones have launched this benefit to help him with the medical expenses he faces. Any and all help is appreciated, including sharing this link with others.

The URL for this page is http://www.indiegogo.com/brianwalker

‎"Brian Walker has been an extraordinarily dear friend of mine for many many years. If there were ever a very real and worthwhile cause to contribute to, that helps out a member of our community immediately improve their life...this is it. PLEASE consider donating and sharing this post. Even one dollar will go a very long way."
- Dawn Bland
"Hi friends,

As a lot of us are thinking today about the tragedy that cancer leaves in its wake. Please also take a moment to remember the people that are survivors but have had their lives (and credit ratings) changed forever. If you have a couple extra bucks, please send them towards my friend Brian Walker. If you have bought groceries at Weaver Street or Whole Foods in the last decade or so, he has probably had something to do with it."
- Mike Nutt
"If you ever wished that you could do more to help others and make the world a better place, please consider donating to one of my oldest and dearest friend's health fund. Brian IS one of those people that makes the world a better place to live in. I would not ask unless I truly thought it was a worthy cause.
much love :)"
- Alyson Grove

story:
THIS IS OVER & I've BEGUN! 


Hi! This campaign has run it's course and i am eternally grateful to those who were reached and able to contribute toward my fundraising goal. 


Thank You Thank You Thank You 


One of the greatest blessings of this experience was to reach some clarity on what I have to offer the world right now. I've posted my offering of personalized poems - 'soul re-minders' - to my web and much of what can be read on this Indie campaign page is there as well, please see Mother Lode. 


many thanks and much love, megan


and....

I have just completed an almost 20-year healing journey that began with diagnosis of melanoma skin cancer when I was 19 years old... at least that is when I devoted my life to healing and began rolling with the changes that healing from childhood incest commands... I am in major transition now to a creative life as a change artist (healer), writer, and compassion activist with an eye on world peace. 

I have a few projects in the works, including the writing of an epic tale of original severance and Transcending the Veil, a book that chronicles my spiritual journey from shame to rapture along with the life story of ‘the big stump’ of Calaveras Big Trees State Park. I also have a good bit of poetry coming through and am focused on growing partnerships on Extinction Witness, a creative spiritual regeneration project I seeded in January 2012. Read more on my projects below.

The writing of Transcending the Veil: A Journey through the Heart of Nature offers closure and larger purpose to the completion of my healing journey. With the writing, I share the bounty of all I have learned.

The seeding of Extinction Witness marked my absolute devotion to personal integrity, which for me means heeding my intuition. Since that turning point, I have once again utterly transformed my life. This time, I have fully aligned with my soul and restored Spirit to my being. 

During the 9 month 'home stretch' of my healing process, all I could do was maintain the basics for myself and my 3.5 year old son, for whom I was the single primary caregiver at the time. I let go of all work obligations other than my creative projects. I truly could not focus on anything other than the love and creative inspiration flowing through. I am relieved and thrilled to be through the healing process and readied for a life of service directed toward restoring beauty to Earth.

While I thrive in solitude (I am a writer and dreamer after all), there is good reason why practitioners seek refuge in community. Spiritual and psychological regeneration is precarious even for those who prepare for and actively seek heart opening and community provides essential encouragement and nourishment. I would not be here but for those who were present with me from afar and am eternally grateful for them. You can read a reflection on my 9 month process at Elephant Journal. 

Right now, I am in major transition that includes manifesting steady income and a move from rural Montana in the interest of being with creative/collaborative friends. I seek refuge in a community of kindred spirits because a supportive and encouraging environment nourishes the home fire which can otherwise exhaust itself. 

I am radically simplifying my life. I am selling and giving away all in material that I do not use and appreciate regularly. I just sold my rig, so I am no longer burdened with purchasing gasoline for solo use and that has me feeling light as a feather!

For the first that I can recall, I am happy, excited and fully invested in the present. My happiness is very much grounded as an abiding faith in humanity and felt experience of life’s longing for itself - a power beyond words. My excitement extends to all far into the future. So, I am in celebration mode while rather brilliantly starting from scratch!

This Indiegogo campaign is invitation for you to help ease me into an essentially creative and ecstatic life of service that naturally comes hand in hand with a wide open heart.

I am eternally grateful for your support by way of money, cheers, project collaboration, and shares of this campaign through your social networks!

If you wish, please also read on for some detail on me, how your pledge will be spent, the projects I have going, and your reward options.

Love, thank you so much!!!

Megan


SOME DETAIL ON ME

I am a mother, change artist, and compassion activist.

As an un-ordained spiritual teacher and healer, I am reseeding right relationship with birth and death, and confirming The Golden Rule as a spiritual truth rooted in natural law. 

I began identifying myself as water on fire in 2011, having been re-ignited to activism by footage of water catching fire as a result of horizontal hydraulic fracturing (also known as ‘fracking’) in the film Gasland. I did not realize the full weight of my brand until the first half of 2013, during which I experienced what can only be described as a spiritually regenerative and purifying love like wildfire. Read about my resonance with sequoia on my web www.meganhollingsworth.com

My activist roots are in the Zero Cut and Earth First! movements. As founder and director at Extinction Witness, I am out to create spiritual regeneration projects essential for the regeneration of Earth’s cultural and biological diversity. The project represents the fullness of my healing path, including my formal education in human anatomy and physiology, psychology, environmental biology, physics, chemistry, toxicology, and ecology. Extinction Witness stems most immediately from my activist roots and my graduate study, which explored the human emotional and spiritual response to genocide and the present mass extinction of species.


HOW YOUR MONEY WILL BE SPENT

Someone trusted once told me that high aspirations are supported. I believe him. My vision is deep and wide, and my needs are simple and pure. I have enough love and joy to feed the world and I am ecstatic because I am ready to share!

I believe the goal I have set for this campaign will realistically carry me through for two months while I am in transition.

All monies received through this Indiegogo campaign will go solely to supporting me with food, shelter, moving expenses and the basics I need to stay connected with the world while I am in transition to paid work, during which time I will also be intensely focused on completing my manuscript.

I have Transcending the Veil fully outlined with the introduction and most of the first chapter complete. I can finish the manuscript in 7 weeks. See TV Table of Contents.


SOME DETAIL ON MY PROJECTS

The Epic Tale of Original Severance is in total gestation with all magic and mystery :-)

Transcending the Veil: A Journey through the Heart of Nature messages spiritual and ecological regeneration through the power of divine love. The book, a compilation of prose and poetry reflects much of what I have learned along the journey of personal healing from embodying shame to embodying radical joy and Soul-Spirit driven creativity.

Because my heart goes to the whole world, Transcending the Veil weds my journey with that of humanity and Earth as we heal from the era of human insecurity. 

Poems can be read at Wail Dance Blog.

Extinction Witness: Running on the premise that the present mass extinction of species is driven by how humans relate with themselves and all others, Extinction Witness creates and curates memorials for spiritual regeneration. Extinction Witness serves in the realms of Spirit and human emotion, also known as energy. Love’s healthy/appropriate emotional response to loss is weeping.

I’ve been pouring everything I have into Extinction Witness for the past year and a half. The project is now ripe for organizational and creative partners. So strategic partnership building is my current focus with this project. You can read more on Extinction Witness and our first regeneration project, Virgin: Restoring Big Trees and Whole Women, on my web.

Here is a short introduction to Extinction Witness and 'Wildfire a love story', the first finished piece of Virgin.




WHAT I WANT TO GIVE YOU!

I offer many ‘rewards’ in exchange for your support, among them all my infinite and eternal gratitude!!! Thank you so much!

in case you are wondering on the pledge amounts i've listed with the rewards,

i have switched the numbers from the common zeros not to scam you, but because we do not have to count by 5's and 10's and i enjoy summing up numbers within numbers and indeed there is magic in that and this old world is ever ready for some good old-fashioned charming... 


'Commencement' 
photo © 2013 Jack Gescheidt, fine art print for you at $261 pledge level


My favorites of the rewards are the option for us to be in touch by way of a handwritten note from me to you, which comes with any pledge level AND the opportunity starting at the $27 pledge level for me to write and send you a poem inspired by a comment, story, and/or memory of yours.

Depending on the story you share that inspires the poem and whether or not you grant permission, your poem may just wind up in Transcending the Veil or the collection of poems and sketches I offer at the $99 pledge level.

Poems… I love distilling love to the core...


Here is a sample of my poetry:


your nose

If you should meet the deepest ocean,

kiss the endless sky,

touch the full moon,

then

will you be convinced?


Will you see yourself bowing before you?

or

Will you stand in place pondering your nose?


You who desire flight, yet do not see land.

You who desire truth, yet do not listen to water.

You who desire love, yet do not feel fire.


What can be known

that has not been revealed always

and just past the tip of your nose?

-  Megan Hollingsworth, August 2013



HOW INDIEGOGO WORKS

When you choose to back a creative project/person, you become an essential element in the creative process. 

Your pledge is both vital financial support and a huge “YES!” to the project/person.


Here’s how it works…

Step 1: Be excited to see me reach my funding goal and safely land in community and the creative compassion-infused work that I aspire to.

Step 2: Choose a pledge amount that works for you and, if you wish, choose the Pledge Reward you desire to receive! Minimum pledge is $9 and you can choose any amount from there.

Step 3: Choose a payment method and make your pledge.

Step 4: Let your friends know about this unreasonably joyful woman who is ever grateful for help and encouragement! Facebook, Twitter, blog or email any and all you think may be inspired to help me ease through this grand transition.

Step 5: Check in on this campaign progress. I will post updates, including new poems, book content and the raw logistics of my transition.


infinite gratitude

mountains of love & joy


thank you! 

megan
story_txt:
THIS IS OVER & I've BEGUN! 

Hi! This campaign has run it's course and i am eternally grateful to those who were reached and able to contribute toward my fundraising goal. 

Thank You Thank You Thank You 

One of the greatest blessings of this experience was to reach some clarity on what I have to offer the world right now. I've posted my offering of personalized poems - 'soul re-minders' - to my web and much of what can be read on this Indie campaign page is there as well, please see Mother Lode. 

many thanks and much love, megan

and....
I have just completed an almost 20-year healing journey that began with diagnosis of melanoma skin cancer when I was 19 years old... at least that is when I devoted my life to healing and began rolling with the changes that healing from childhood incest commands... I am in major transition now to a creative life as a change artist (healer), writer, and compassion activist with an eye on world peace. 

I have a few projects in the works, including the writing of an epic tale of original severance and Transcending the Veil, a book that chronicles my spiritual journey from shame to rapture along with the life story of ‘the big stump’ of Calaveras Big Trees State Park. I also have a good bit of poetry coming through and am focused on growing partnerships on Extinction Witness, a creative spiritual regeneration project I seeded in January 2012. Read more on my projects below.
The writing of Transcending the Veil: A Journey through the Heart of Nature offers closure and larger purpose to the completion of my healing journey. With the writing, I share the bounty of all I have learned.
The seeding of Extinction Witness marked my absolute devotion to personal integrity, which for me means heeding my intuition. Since that turning point, I have once again utterly transformed my life. This time, I have fully aligned with my soul and restored Spirit to my being. 

During the 9 month 'home stretch' of my healing process, all I could do was maintain the basics for myself and my 3.5 year old son, for whom I was the single primary caregiver at the time. I let go of all work obligations other than my creative projects. I truly could not focus on anything other than the love and creative inspiration flowing through. I am relieved and thrilled to be through the healing process and readied for a life of service directed toward restoring beauty to Earth.
While I thrive in solitude (I am a writer and dreamer after all), there is good reason why practitioners seek refuge in community. Spiritual and psychological regeneration is precarious even for those who prepare for and actively seek heart opening and community provides essential encouragement and nourishment. I would not be here but for those who were present with me from afar and am eternally grateful for them. You can read a reflection on my 9 month process at Elephant Journal. 

Right
now,
I am in major transition that includes manifesting steady income and a
move from rural Montana in the interest of being with creative/collaborative friends. I seek refuge in a community of kindred spirits because a supportive and encouraging environment nourishes the home fire which can otherwise exhaust itself. 

I
am radically simplifying my life. I
am selling and giving away all in material that I do not use and appreciate
regularly. I just sold my rig, so I am no longer burdened with purchasing
gasoline for solo use and that has me feeling light as a feather!
For
the first that I can recall, I am happy, excited and fully invested in the
present. My happiness is very much grounded as an
abiding faith in humanity and felt experience of life’s longing for itself - a power beyond words. My excitement extends to all far into the
future. So, I am in celebration mode while rather
brilliantly starting from scratch! 
This
Indiegogo campaign is invitation for you to help ease me into an essentially
creative and ecstatic life of service that naturally comes hand in hand with a wide
open heart.
I am eternally grateful for your support by way
of money, cheers, project collaboration, and shares of this campaign through your social networks! 
If you wish, please also read on for some detail
on me, how your pledge will be spent, the projects I have going, and your reward options.
Love, thank you so much!!!
Megan


SOME
DETAIL ON ME
I am a mother, change artist, and compassion
activist.
As an un-ordained spiritual teacher and
healer, I am reseeding right relationship with birth and death, and confirming
The Golden Rule as a spiritual truth rooted in natural law. 
I began identifying myself as water on fire in 2011, having been re-ignited to activism by footage of water catching fire as a result of horizontal hydraulic fracturing (also known as ‘fracking’) in the film Gasland. I did not realize the full
weight of my brand until the first half of 2013, during which I experienced
what can only be described as a spiritually regenerative and purifying love
like wildfire. Read about my resonance with sequoia on my web www.meganhollingsworth.com
My activist roots are in the Zero Cut and Earth
First! movements. As founder and director at Extinction Witness,
I am out to create spiritual regeneration projects essential for the
regeneration of Earth’s cultural and biological diversity. The project
represents the fullness of my healing path, including my formal education
in human anatomy and physiology, psychology, environmental biology,
physics, chemistry, toxicology, and ecology. Extinction Witness stems most immediately
from my activist roots and my graduate study, which explored the human
emotional and spiritual response to genocide and the present mass extinction of
species.

HOW
YOUR MONEY WILL BE SPENT
Someone trusted once told me that high aspirations are supported. I believe him. My vision is deep and wide, and my needs are
simple and pure. I have enough love and joy to feed the world and I am ecstatic because I am
ready to share!
I believe the goal I have set for this campaign will realistically carry me through for two months while I am in transition.
All
monies received through this Indiegogo campaign will go solely to supporting me
with food, shelter, moving expenses and the basics I need to stay connected
with the world while I am in transition to paid work, during which time I will also
be intensely focused on completing my manuscript.
I have Transcending
the Veil fully outlined with the introduction and most of the first chapter
complete. I can finish the manuscript in 7 weeks. See TV Table of
Contents.

SOME
DETAIL ON MY PROJECTS
The
Epic Tale of Original Severance is in total
gestation with all magic and mystery :-)
Transcending
the Veil: A Journey through the Heart of Nature messages
spiritual and ecological regeneration through the power of divine love. The
book, a compilation of prose and poetry reflects much of what I have learned along the journey of personal healing from embodying
shame to embodying radical joy and Soul-Spirit driven creativity. 
Because my heart goes to the whole world, Transcending the Veil weds my journey
with that of humanity and Earth as we heal from the era of human
insecurity. 
Poems can be read at Wail
Dance Blog.
Extinction
Witness: Running on the premise that the present mass
extinction of species is driven by how humans relate
with themselves and all others, Extinction Witness creates and curates
memorials for spiritual regeneration. Extinction Witness serves in the realms

response to loss is weeping.

partnership building is my current focus with this project. You can read more
on Extinction Witness and our first regeneration project, Virgin: Restoring Big

story:
Short Summary

My name is Raul, and I am a graduate student at the Computer Science Department at the University of Maryland, College Park. I need your help to do a research project that could change the way you interact with the objects around you. I want to use an Electroencephalography (EEG) sensor (measures your brain waves) to measure a person's concentration and to tell the object in-front of  him or her that this person is engaging with it. In other words if you concentrate on the object in-front of you, let the object know that you want to interact with it. This object for now will be a computer program, but in the future it could be anything. As you can see in the picture, instead of using an EEG I am using my girlfriend's headband, which doesn't measure any brainwaves =(.

I am a graduate student and don't have the money to build a prototype. The good news is that you can help me do it. The cost of labor, I will do for free. Indiegogo does not let me set a goal of less than $500, so any money left after the project as well as all the equipment bought with the money raised will be donated to UMD's Hackerspace http://cmsc838f-s15.wikispaces.com/ at the end of semester (in May 2015).

Deliverables

Like all the other projects for the class, the deliverables will be:

* Utilize github to store and post my code. This will be publicly viewable and accessible.

* Upload a video demoing my project to YouTube.

* A post in http://www.instructables.com/ with detailed instructions on how I built the prototype.

Context

I am taking the class 838f CMSC Tangible Interactive Computing taught by Professor Jon Froehlich at the University of Maryland, CP.

The class in itself is innovative and it pushes students to think outside of the box to come up with new ways of interacting with the world.

The class ends in May 2015 and for my final project I want to communicate with objects using my brain waves and the electrical signals in my muscles.

I have researched what I need to buy and have the specifics below:

Note: All prices are listed in USD.

From: sparkfun https://www.sparkfun.com/

2 X Sensor Cable - Electrode Pads (3 connector)

$9.90

2 X Biomedical Sensor Pad (10 pack)

$7.95

2 X Muscle Sensor v3

$53.90

Sparkfun Subtotal:    $71.75

Sparkfun Shipping/Handling:    $4.42

---------------------------------------

From: Neurosky and buying it through Amazon 

http://store.neurosky.com/products/mindwave-1&l...

EEG - Mindwave     $79

Neurosky/Amazon Subtotal:    $79.00

Shipping/Handling:    $5

---------------------------------------

From: University of Maryland Hackerspace

This is a fee to be able to use their equipment and replace material that we use: $125.00

---------------------------------------

From: Me

Cost of Labor: Will do it for FREE!

---------------------------------------

Grand Total (Sparkfun + Neurosky + UMD Hackerspace): $285.17

The rest of the money goes to UMD's Hackerspace so that they can buy more equipment for other ambitious students like me.

Risks & Challenges

I am confident in that I will be able to use and do any programming that I need for the Mindwave to measure brainwaves and the muscle sensors to measure my arm movements.  Also interacting with objects through arm movements using the muscle sensors has been done a lot and is straight forward. The research idea that I am testing with this project is how to trigger an interaction using brainwaves. I am hoping that I can use the person's brainwaves to tell an object whether a person is engaging with it or not. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Any expertise on the resources listed above is always welcome.

story:
Hello!  My name is Sara Pennington and I fell in love with Zumba® in 2012 and quickly realized that I had found my passion.  Zumba® is a Latin inspired dance fitness class that feels more like a party than a workout.  I became a licensed instructor on March 23, 2013 and more than anything,  I wanted to share what I found with everyone, so I started FREE Zumba® on the Plaza in June 2013.
FREE Zumba® on the Plaza is all about inspiring people to lead a more active lifestyle and discover that exercise can be fun and exciting!  It's about providing a fitness class to those who may not be able to afford monthly membership fees to a gym or a fitness studio.  It's about bringing people together to make a positive impact on our community. It's about inspiring people to make healthy lifestyle changes.  It's my way of contributing to the health of our community and to the patients and their families that may be visiting Mayo Clinic. In most cases you have to join a gym or pay a class fee to even try Zumba®.  At FREE Zumba® on the Plaza they get to try it for free outside, in a non-intimidating, fun environment.

2013 was the first season and 100% of the cost was put on my personal credit card. Because I couldn't continue to solely fund the event, in 2014 I was able to get some help from Sponsors, however, I still had to cover a portion of the cost myself.  In 2014 sponsors came forward and the attendance more than doubled.  This year I decided to extend the event through September, which of course increases the cost.
Right now I am financing a portion of the costs associated with Zumba® on the Plaza and I am certainly not able to cover this cost for the entire season.  I am just one individual who wants to contribute to the health of our community.  Without a Non-profit status, finding sponsors to help cover cost has been a big challenge this year.  My sponsors are so very important to me because without them, I would not be able to continue this popular event.

The cost of this event is as follows:
  • Sound Production: $2700
  • Print Materials: $400 (banner, posters, rack cards)
  • Social Media Ads: $200-$300 (ad graphic, ad placement)
  • Ice, towels and other supplies: $200
All funds will go to cover the cost of this event.
I want to give a special thank you to EDGE Fitness here in Rochester.  They are my first Title Sponsor and I am grateful for their partnership!  If you get a chance to stop in to EDGE, please thank them for their support!
5 years ago I never would have thought that I would be in front of a group of people leading a fitness class.  I simply wasn't that brave until I found Zumba® and experienced how it empowered me.  People say I'm crazy, that I could charge admission and cover my cost plus make money, but I absolutely do not want to do this as it goes against everything I wish this event to be.  I want to share Zumba® for free so others can become empowered.
As the health of our country declines, events such as this, that inspire people to lead a more active lifestyle, can have a ripple effect.
